lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons. We have a bunch of announcements; try and get through them as fast as possible. First and foremost, Taliesin Jaffe is on his way, he's playing the part of Sam Riegel and being late today.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Clever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But he'll be here shortly. And we do not have a Travis Willingham tonight, unfortunately, he is out of town shooting something pretty awesome, so yeah, boo indeed. Not watching Avengers this time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was the only time he's missed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he was not happy. I know. He's like, why is everyone else leveling and not me yet? Nah, sorry dude. Anyway, so we'll miss you Travis, sorry you're not here. Oh, it sounds like we have a Taliesin. Get in there, Taliesin. We have two sponsors--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what, Matt? Two sponsors?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What? Two sponsors. We're splitting this up, is what we're doing. First, the new tonight-only sponsor we have is Puzzle Quest, Magic Puzzle Quest, actually. If you've watched any other programs this week, Me, Marisha, Liam and Taliesin all did a show that was on Tuesday. Before Talks Machina. Game the Game, with Rebecca and Ivan, where we played it, as well as a number of other ridiculous games. But it's great, I grew up playing Magic, it's very much a mutually--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, Taliesin has it on his iPad right there!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go, and it's facing sideways. But it's a puzzle drop game, but mixed in with the mechanics of Magic. It's free, you can check it out, and they're being awesome, sponsoring us tonight. If you're into fantasy and that type of three-match games, totally up your alley, and if you click on the link in chat, which is bit.ly/criticalquest and try the game out. That's where you can go ahead and find it. So--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You should totally play that during the Thordak fight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is my plan, while you guys are doing your stuff, I'm going to be playing Puzzle Quest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh and Taliesin, also I have left a sheet there for your updated Cabal's Ruin.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we have updated stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow, you nerfed me. Okay. I'm just kidding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, in working on the campaign guide, and the section about the Vestiges, while also seeing how things played out through the game as we've gone through, there's been a slight balance tweak to a couple of them, most in your favor. Enjoy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think you were giving me a little bit of this drunkenly during Westworld, if I recall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think so, actually, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The main thing that has changed on the Spire of Conflux is that I now gain plus one bonus to spell attack rolls and my spell save DC increases by one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a benefit to you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a benefit to anybody who uses it in their own home campaign, it is not just specific.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Fenthras is a plus five to attack? And plus ten to damage rolls?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 12 hours of wings, Matt? Thank you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All the Vestiges suddenly turn to dust. In your bag. And your tears.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have chosen poorly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly. So yeah! So aside from Magic Puzzle Quest, we also have our secondary sponsor, Loot Crate!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know, guys, I always do a little fun Loot Crate thing, but this week I'm not going to be doing the Loot Crate announcement. This week, my new character that I've been workshopping, Brody Slater! Of Malibu, California is going to be doing the Loot Crate ad. I've been workshopping this, I've been doing some acting coach work with it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How you never did a rhyme on SNL is beyond me, man, I don't know how--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's pretty good! A little Scottish at the end, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Somewhere in Topanga Canyon right now, Dweezil Zappa is bleeding from the nose, going: oh! What?! What?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That blonde hair did something for your complexion, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, no, you were glowing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No wonder you're in voiceover!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, we're versatile actors, and I just want to showcase that to the people!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I hope that's a sneak peek of your character in the next campaign, Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Definitely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're welcome, Brian. Next up! Next Monday December 12th, from 4:00pm to 6:00pm, there's an extra special holiday season episode of Dick and Johnson happening here. Dick and Johnson Save Everything Ultra Holiday Special-- such a specific title-- going to be a bunch of guests, including Chloe Dykstra, myself, I will be showing up for a little bit, with some ridiculousness in characters, so you guys need to check it out if you haven't already, it's-- how do you describe the game? It's like a shark riding a reindeer shooting a minigun, while waving an American flag and playing D&D.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a great tattoo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a challenge to you guys. Show us your pictures of your great amazing Dick and Johnson tattoo. Wherever it may be on your Dick and Johnson. But tune in next Monday, December 12th, at 4:00 to 6:00pm, check it out, I'll see you there. All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So many announcements.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Check out the good times. That's out now on YouTube and the Geek and Sundry website. Also, at the break today, we have a very special video from our good friend Patrick Rothfuss and plays Kerr in the world, as we're helping support his Worldbuilders charity, which has been doing amazing, gangbusters, and they're setting up a specific Critical Role page on that, with a few prizes that we're providing from our end as well for people that enter and donate, that you can win. So he's going to put together a video and information about the page will be available very soon. Go check it out, it's an amazing charity, I've talked about it here before, and the money's being matched, dollar for dollar, by a number of corporations for everything you donate. So check out the break for a special message from Patrick Rothfuss.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's a good human being.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's a good man. And he wanted to be here tonight but he's unfortunately in a-- I say unfortunately-- fortunately in a tux, at the, I think it's the game-- what? The--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Gamer's Choice Awards?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No no no no. Child's Play, I think, charity event tonight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the gamer's Shorty Awards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --and you guys, so say hello to Mark everyone. Mark, I'm blown away by your generosity, and I think it's a fantastic example once again of the power of community that you've all put together and helping support other people who don't have the opportunity.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: World's gotten a little wonky, time for love and generosity is never better than now, so thanks guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I completely agree. Thank you, Mark. Really appreciate it, thanks buddy.

lines.name: MARK
lines.text: Kill the dragons, he's got to die!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He said, he said, Mark said, he's got to die. He's got to die, Matt, he's got to die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you know, maybe I gave you a damage bonus, I don't know. Thank you, Mark.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And yeah, and as always, 826LA is amazing, and there might be a local branch in your city, I know there's one in San Francisco, I know there's one in New York, I know there's one in Chicago.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You should totally check it out, you can also-- they have web stores, and you should go onto their web stores because there's a lot of really good Christmas stuff that you can buy that's fun and arty and poetry-ish, and kids poetry that you can buy books of that's actually really good, and it's a great Christmas gift, and you're giving to a good cause. It's amazing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hell yeah. Oh, and I forgot to mention this too, for the Talks Machina announcement too, while it's remaining on Twitch, also they will have an enhanced version on Alpha in the new year as well, so you'll have that positive element of it, too, and get to see what the platform is capable of doing with that show. So. There you go. Spotify playlists are still rolling out. We had Laura's go up last Friday.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was so good, it was so good!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you think so?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I did, I liked it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it maybe because you had a song on there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, that's part of it, but the whole thing was pretty good!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks, bro.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's all Debbie Gibson.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You had a song on there, too, Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I did?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I know you didn't listen to it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I haven't. I will tonight. I'll go down to Spotify, or Geek and Sundry, or wherever you get them, and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you ever listen to any of the first playlists that we put out?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are on a show called Critical Role, where a group of nerdy-ass voice actors--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I listened to them. I read your little blurbs. I did, I did those things.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I just got the Christmas spirit all up in my heart. Nice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's get some seltzer, we'll get that right out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you for your click on the Geek and Sundry website, I guess!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just a click, not a like.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And, last--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who is the Spotify playlist this week?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, it's me? Oh, that's great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have you done it yet?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I know I did it, I did do it-- It's good, it's good music.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sam will listen to it in five months.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you haven't been before, I recommend it, if you have been, go again! We'll be there. Come and say hi.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's also a couple more announcements.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: More and more and more and more.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then, also announced at the same time, was Last of Us 2, starring one Ashley Johnson, so we're all very very very excited about it--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Our D&D show book-ended PSX, that's cool, actually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it was pretty frickin' cool. And those are going to be a long time before they're out, but you know, it's still really awesome. And then! Finishing announcements tonight with some special, special treats, which is--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I haven't even seen that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A Critical Role hat. Yeah, you've been in here the whole time. This is out, in the store, right now, as well as Critical Role dice! So, I have heard tell that if you get these ordered-- if you live in the United States, at least, I'm sorry international Critters-- but if you live in the US then you should be able to get these before Christmas!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yay! Stocking stuffers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, great stocking stuffers, great under the tree presents too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is a fine-ass baseball cap. On the inside it says: How Do You Want To Do This? Oh, and your head is so small, and my head is so large.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And it's all embroidered.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And it's perfect for when we play all the other Dungeons & Dragons Twitch shows in our softball league!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right? So we have a certain amount. And I by the way rolled these dice, before the show, and I got a critical on my d20, so--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No guarantee.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But if you want 'em for Christmas, then you know, probably get them soon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back, ladies and gentlemen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A lot happened. A lot happened in that break.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Apparently! I missed most of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pure chaos.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm so removed from most events at the table before the game starts, I'm like: what happened? What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you phase out so you don't hear the terrible things we say?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Last we left off, you were meeting underneath Whitestone at the ziggurat, with the current standing council, the War Council, of both Whitestone and this entire endeavor. You decided a couple of people to come with you, and now is your time to spend the next day or so wisely, as the army from Fort Daxio and Syngorn will be arriving at Emon by about sundown the following day. Your airship was in transit to Daxio, and has been rerouted to Emon as well. Everyone is converging to the city. What do you want to do to prepare?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, it's all happening!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. They're all going to the city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, what time of day is it right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now, I'd say about mid-afternoon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we still down by the ziggurat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you guys just finished your meeting at the ziggurat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have some guns to repair, because everything broke, and many of these things cost money now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's small picture. We're big picture.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How long is the trip, did we say? To get to Emon from here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Instant for us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we have to go through a tree.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or a teleportation circle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then we're meeting with Dad?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, he's marching to Emon right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we going to have a meeting spot outside of Emon? We should probably have a plan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should probably get close to Greyskull and see if we can enter through the tunnels.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think that's our way, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, but we do have to rally with your pops, and also didn't we cut loose 55 soldiers to wander free in the desert from Daxio?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're meeting the other armies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're just going to form up?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trust in them. They're soldiers, they'll be able to find their way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right. But can we scry and figure out where this other army is? Maybe we'll go there? Or maybe we should scry on our old keep and go there. Those seem like two good locations.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think scrying on the old keep and then letting everyone know-- we don't necessarily want everyone arriving at the same place as well, as long as there's a coordinated movement towards the city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They can all start attacking and we can come in from the bottom.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, but we've told the approaching army nothing about any plan whatsoever.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can call them if we need to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we probably want different regiments flanking the city in different areas?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then maybe the 50 men coming into the sewers to fight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I feel like we want to catch up with our father's army before they're anywhere near the walls of the city, because, well, that'd be stupid.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can go meet them if that's the next move.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And strategize when we get there? Once we see their forces, and what they have to offer?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy, do you still have that map of Emon?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, somewhere.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should probably talk to Gilmore as well, and let him know that he has to fucking join us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That he drew the short straw. We drew the short straw for him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We should also collect some other allies, if we're going to head in this direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Do you want to go talk to Gilmore, Vaxy-poo?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to need a painter, you know a painter, we should bring a painter with us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A painter? To paint our exploits?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, to paint our exploits. You have that portrait--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Once again, Percy, I feel like that's small picture--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it small potatoes? Is it really, though?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We could find a jeweller right now. If that's what you're into.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a man at a casino that I really need to get revenge on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You might as well get it all done now, because you're not going to be able to do it later.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 24 hours left alive!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kynan? Kynan!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But no, stock up on what-- again, Whitestone doesn't necessarily have a lot for us to gather--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we should bring any potions. How we doing on potions? Did you ever divvy up our last several potions?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did divvy up our last potions, I feel like it might be smart to get some more, but the only place to really buy any is Vasselheim.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that true?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean it's the only city still standing that we have access to immediately. We don't have a lot of time. The thing is, I feel like people in Vasselheim said they would help us, but I don't know how they'd get to Emon to help us in time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know, an airship! Oh shit, where's our airship?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's on its way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To where?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Emon. To Emon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did we say Emon, or did we say Daxio?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was on its way to Daxio--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're redirecting to Emon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank God. We're sending it to a dragon instead of a fort on fire.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It does have weaponry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. It's made to take on things attacking it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's designed to help keep him on the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh-huh, yeah, it's a giant balloon in the air--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not a balloon, actually--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, no, it's a giant crystal. It's-- I know I keep saying--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I always think of it as a high-tech Hindenberg.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know. Please don't say that. That's not funny.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a metaphor for Vox Machina.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. If there ever was one, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Besides gathering our forces here, gathering our potions here, and telling Gilmore, where are we going? Let's put it to a vote, as we always do, democratically. Grog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog, where would you like to go? To the army waiting just outside of Emon, or to our old ratty keep with nothing in it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "I'd like to go to the--" I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know what he wants.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy's getting a little strange off to the side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, Travis is watching, so he can just text in, yeah. Grog is thinking about it. Grog is thinking really hard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He considers it for a second and goes, "Whatever makes me kill things faster."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, have we rested?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did rest before coming here. You spent the evening in Fort Daxio.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then we teleported. No, Allura brought us here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know why, but it's been mentioned.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on, I can scry on our keep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can't Allura send a message to them and let them know what our plan is, and then we don't have to actually bamf there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't have a plan!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wherever we go, we can let everyone know what the plan and where we're going is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like what we need to do-- okay, here's what I think our plan should be.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lead us, O Mighty Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like we should tell the armies gathering to prepare to attack. We enter in where the Clasp is; we come in from the bottom up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So they're going to create a diversion for us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Exactly. They take on the armies while we head straight to Thordak.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dad creates a shit-storm at the wall, and we take advantage of that chaos.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have to communicate this to them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Easy to do. We just send a message.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could send a message, or we could bamf there and then bamf another place. It seems a lot of time wasted.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, easier just to send a message.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura has been in communication and has been the information hub between most of these individuals.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How long did we say before Syldor reaches Emon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By about dusk the following day.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dusk the following day. And you said afternoon right now? So a little more than 24 hours.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can at least get into there and start communicating with the Clasp.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're not really in good standing with them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sure they'll be happy to see us, regardless.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You think? I guess. Sure. It's like seeing that person you hated in high school after something terrible just happened. Happy for the familiarity.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But now they're a little bit overweight and they work in an Applebee's.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure, and it's a little gratifying?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They can hate us, and we can deal with that afterward, if there is even an afterward.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're businessmen; I doubt they hold grudges.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sure they hold grudges.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not until after the dragon's been taken care of.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then they'll make us pay?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. It's not profitable to kill us before the dragon is dead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, somewhere in all this fracas, we need you to take care of us with food.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: When it's time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right, when is the time?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think once we're there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It lasts for 24 hours.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Before we head in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In the keep, for old time's sake?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think that's very smart.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean underneath.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hopefully, in the keep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we have a clear plan, then?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have a plan for dinner.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's no guarantees, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are we going? That's all I care about right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're probably going to be dead in 48 hours.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but we'll be together, and I don't think that I'll die.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're adorable.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're going to be in front, if anything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is the worst of two extremes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You should scry on Greyskull.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is anyone still there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Last time I looked in, there was some movement, or it looked like people had recently been there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wasn't it Drexel? Dranzel?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope, they're off somewhere else.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You said by sunset tomorrow is when they'll be at Emon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's when they'll be there and ready.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want more information, you might have to talk to somebody who has that information.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. What we need to do is plan a time that they start the attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. We've got to get there first and suss it out, too. We haven't done any recon. This army of your father's, we have no idea how big it is, if they have archers, if they have an elite SWAT team task force--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How do you feel that will affect our plan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we know we have an elite SWAT team task force, we can take them down with us into the sewers!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can almost promise you they do not have an elite SWAT team task force.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They might have some stealthy--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Some stealthy individuals.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have friends of our own.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Also, if we do any recon, we might know that oh, there's a big thing we need to have taken out before we can even get in. What if our keep is being surrounded?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This will answer plenty of questions, and then we'll go from there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scry away, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did we leave Laina there? Did we leave anyone there, or is it completely vacated?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was chaos when we left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it was absolute chaos. You pushed your servants through. Your staff still currently exists somewhere in Whitestone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can't scry on a building, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We fought Vorugal and then high-tailed it out of there; inside and gone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can't scry on a building.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you scry on a plant?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you scry on a dead thing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I scry on a plant?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There is a tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't steal my thunder!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One that I've had personal communications with.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say, due to the fact that you are a druid and nature is your basis, if it is a specific plant-based entity that you are very familiar with, sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we have anything like that at our keep?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a number of trees in the front; you have the garden that you built in Sarenrae's temple.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I want to scry on. I want to start there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know how it's always, "you zoom in really fast, and you zoom in really fast--" Can I slow down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't work that way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can't pull focus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In theory, scrying is only supposed to show you what's there. I narratively let a little bit of a journey happen. You can't control the journey, sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: DVR it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's the worst. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so where are you doing the spell?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where are you doing your Scry ritual?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not near the ziggurat, if we're still there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, so are you guys heading back to the castle, then?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, let's go to the castle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While you guys are heading back to the castle from underneath the tunnels, you are briefly headed off by a familiar dwarven fellow in robes and a crystalline staff: Elementalist Drake Thunderbrand. "By the way, before you leave, we've been working on a few things for you. They should "be of assistance to you. Come find me in the common room whenever you're ready."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, sure. Wow, fortuitous.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I like presents.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As your vision swivels over to the tree, there in the temple, while contained here for as long as it's been, it seems to be healthy. Looking in the vicinity, most everything seems in place.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do the trees look overgrown? Do the plants look overgrown?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As much as being away for the handful of months that you have been. They look like they haven't been trimmed or tended to recently.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And the temple is intact? It looks like the keep is still intact from where we rebuilt it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. It has not fallen.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I sense any movement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check with disadvantage through your Scry spell.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I can't help. Yeah, no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I rolled two ones. Both ones. I'll say that's just flushing it out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Strangely, somehow through a Scry spell, something got in your eye in the temple.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know if it's divine energy interference or what, but it stings a lot, and you feel the essence of the spell begin to shiver and quake, and as you try and clear your vision through, it remains blurred.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still there; your presence is there, but you don't have the capability of seeing anything beyond the tree you're focused on. The Scry spell is focused on the tree, and everything around it has this hazy fog-of-war feel about five feet beyond it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good scry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good scry, guys. Good scry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did you see? Anything good? Are we safe?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's still standing, for the most part. I saw Pike's-- wait, her celestial being wasn't still there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it was temporarily summoned for the reconstruction of the ceiling portion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Looks okay. Looks like home.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Still standing? There wasn't anybody around it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I couldn't tell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How's my comic book collection? Is it still there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Burned.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mint in box.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's as close to a guarantee as we're going to get.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I told you to get a fire box.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think Drake would join us?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who? Little guy? I'd like to be the shortest on this trip, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Got it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where's Kash?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Zahra?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kash was really mad at us last time we talked to him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So maybe we shouldn't ask him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I talked to him last time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't even want Kash to come. I don't even want him around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When we walk near his residence, let's walk around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That guy is a badass motherfucker, and we do want him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know why

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, he's got those brown eyes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, he's got one brown eye and one blue eye, I think.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are this loopy because we're genuinely terrified, and we're doing everything we can not to go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's called gallows humor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to go ask Zahra if she'll join us. Can I go talk to Zahra?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll go find Shaun, after her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys are forcing me into going and talking to Kash, aren't you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan can ask him. It doesn't have to be you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would you prefer me to go? We do have a rapport.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do want to ask Jarett to come too, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're on Kash duty, Kiki.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan, do you need a little resolve for this fight?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just want to see Jarett. He's our most solid ally, and most dependable friend.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's no other reason?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's been there for us in our time of need.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Still no other reason?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Solid. You do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to talk to Cassandra about one last dip into the vaults to see if there's any potions. We know we have to leave them with something in case everything goes wrong, but anything we can take with us will be helpful, and then I have to fix this giant mess of parts that are currently in my bag. I may need to spend a little money. I do apologize.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Darling.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, just letting you know. It might be a bit expensive to get everything working again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percy, spend it all.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will not spend it all. I promise.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I gave an entire bag of jewels to a random efreet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was brazen, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We got armor out of it, though. It's not like we didn't get something from it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If anyone asks about the plan, the plan is chaos, if everyone agrees with this. We want to break up their forces as much as possible. We want them sending ten percent of their forces to every edge of the city. They know where we're going; they know we're eventually heading to the center, and he's not going to leave anymore, but we're going to make it very difficult for them. They're either going to be fighting us in every corner, or they're going to be letting the entire city fall back to us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to go find Zahra.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Splitting the party five ways.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go find Kash.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Vex, as you progress up to the secondary floor to the outside of Zahra's room, the door is closed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Zahra, dear?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Zahra, you hear a knock at your door.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What is it, darling? I'm trying to sleep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You had one job, pit crew.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You had five jobs--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You had 12 jobs, pit crew.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Anything in my eyes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not much time to sleep, I'm afraid.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Unfortunately, I've been buried in books.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, and plans are moving ahead much faster than we anticipated.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes, we have to go get tattoos. Tell me, what's the news? Catch me up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're marching on Emon tomorrow.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Oh! I was going to get my hair done. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's how it is. All the way.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I haven't heard much. I've been reading, I've been decorating, and I've been enchanting and making things. Tell me, what's the news with Thordak?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, he's terrible. He's even worse than we thought. Armies are marching on the city, and we plan on coming in from underneath, maybe striking at him where he doesn't realize. And we'd like your help, if you're willing.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I don't think so. Oh, all right. Yes, I'd love to. I would love to. I've been craving dragon meat since Rimefang, so yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know if we'll succeed, and I'm sure we won't all make it out alive. It's a big ask.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: (sighs) Isn't death supposed to be a wonderful adventure, as well?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think so.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Fuck it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck it.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Fuck it. Durr 'n' durr. Fuck it. Let's do it. Yeah, all right. I've been sitting for too long; I need some action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you make any dragon arrows?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Buy her a drink first.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'll get back to you on it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I plan on it. So many drinks.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What next? What do we do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We prepare tonight, and we leave tomorrow, I assume. You know us; we don't have a plan, really. I have no idea what's going on. Be prepared.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Isn't that the secret to adulthood, that we're all winging it? Yes, all right. Good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm glad you're joining.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Darling, I'm with you wherever you go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's going to Kashaw? (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Kiki, what are you doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take a long, slow, careful walk down through town to the guard barracks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I try not to step on any cracks in the sidewalk on the way. It's very important.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a warmer and more humid day than you're used to in Whitestone. A couple of insects are out and about. There's a lot of aspects of Whitestone that you're noticing for the first time, because you really want to focus on anything else, and yet suddenly, without warning, you stop and realize you're standing right outside of the barracks. You see that recently there had been a finished training session with the up-and-coming guard, and there, sitting off to the side, partially armored and currently sharpening the edge of his spear, is Kashaw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's on the outside? Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kashaw?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (cheering and applause)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I drop to one knee and start tying my boot. I start retying my shoe.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: You're five feet from me. Am I not supposed to see that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god! Kash! Whoa, I didn't see you there.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Really? Interesting. It was the looking at me that threw me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, I've had something in my eye ever since this scrying spell earlier. Shit's been blurry. Yeah, no. You're clearly in focus now.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi. Hey, how's it going, man?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Everything's been great. Life's been awesome. What can I help you with? (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, Kash, I'm sensing a little bit of underlying aggression.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Really? It's underlying? (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, look. I know we fucked you. Look.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Why don't you send me out to get some milk and go save the world while I'm out there doing that? What's up there, lady? What? What do you want? Speak!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (stammers) I'm trying to think of what to say. Please help us! We're going to die, and we need you. I'm sorry!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I've got nothing to that. Help you what, first of all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, you know how we've been hunting down those dragons?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I vaguely remember it, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've been doing an okay job, because we've killed a few, but now there's the big one that's left, Thordak, and then we might be working with the one that killed all my people, if you remember that there was one that killed them, so now we're working with her, and we're gathering an entire army, and we need as many talented and charming and gifted people that we can get, so I thought-- I'm really sorry we made you be an errand boy. I didn't vote for that, by the way. I was trying to--

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Keep babbling. This is fun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is just how the Patrick Rothfuss conversation went.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: This is how it's going to go with you and Jarett.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Why should I help you? Give me one reason.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why did you bring back Vex?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Because I thought Vax would kill me if I didn't.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe Vax will kill you if you don't help us.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Now I'm not really that scared of him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not true. You did it because you're a good person. You ultimately want to see change in the world. I know you do. And I know you care, even though you pretend like you don't. So that's why.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: In all fairness, dragons bring change.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kash, that's not the type of change-- there are better ways to bring change than through death and destruction.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Who else is helping you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Everyone, and then Zahra.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Z? I'm in. Where is she?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Let's go. Where is she?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Should have led with that. All right, let's go. This way. Glad I spilled my soul and everything, and I just splashed coffee in my face. Come on, Kash. Come on!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: On my way. Let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, as you gather your implements of war and your supplies you may need for this journey, you two head back to the castle, a nice, solid six feet between you as you walk.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I'm hitting the wall constantly over here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't scooch any more!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't have any guests over there.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: We got it!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: You comfortable over there?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: You got enough room, Sam?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're working on getting a bigger cup.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: There's no swiveling.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to give a seat just to my cup, because we have the space here to do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're turning into one person.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: The twinsies will finally be conjoined.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, you are off looking for Jarett. Go ahead and make an investigation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28. All right. You know exactly the type of people that he talks to. Because he's been put in this position of power within the guard hierarchy here in Whitestone, within the Pale Guard, there's really only three people that he hangs with. One of them's Kashaw. One of them's a guy who you never remember the name of, who's fun. That's the guy you're going to go bother. You go and talk to him for a bit, and he points to one of the few currently functioning, non-destroyed taverns in Whitestone. There you find him sitting there drinking alone; not heavy drinking, in his cups, but staring off at the wall and sipping a midday ale.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Friend Jarett.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hi."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's J, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It is, yes. Otherwise, it would be Garett."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm good. I'm a little nervous, to be honest. I like to shoot things from a wall. I "don't like to go through a wall to shoot things, and that's been happening a lot recently, and from "what I've been hearing, tomorrow is looking to be a very big day."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, it's going to be quite a fight. Can we count on you to come with us, perhaps?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'd assume that would be the case. I would not want to have all of you disappear into "darkness and fire without me yelling behind you, 'don't die!' I figure that's the very least I "could offer for this circumstance."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We would be honored to have you with us, and as you are still technically our employee, there'll be a bonus for you at the end of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Another bonus?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two bonuses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh yeah, there was like four bonuses."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You deserve all of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Damn right."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The other thing that we had talked about, did that ever come to fruition?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, it was unfortunate. You see, my sister is engaged recently--" And he stands up and walks out of the tavern, putting a coin down on the front of the bar. "No worries. I'll find you "another lady." And he walks outside.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. Oh, we're speaking in code. Okay. Yes, I need a lady so bad, and you were going to find me a date.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes outside and guides you into a shaded portion of a nearby alley and leans against the wall, waiting for you to follow in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So. Is she a brunette?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We're out of the tavern."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I don't know how long to keep the cover going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But I did manage to scavenge a little bit of suude."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Suude?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes." And he pulls out a small brown pouch, maybe about the size of a d20, really. Like a little nugget there, and it's tied tightly, and he pockets real fast. "Now, don't ask me again to do this."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, are you a cop? You have to tell me if you're a cop. Are you a cop?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can't fill their heads with bad ideas. Carry on.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Kids arrested all over town tonight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you a cop? No?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. How much do I owe you for this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whatever you feel you owe me for it. But not "again, please. It's harrowing."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Heroin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Harrowing. It was harrowing to acquire this for you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jarett, thank you for this. Thank you very much. And I'm cool and all, but do you put it up your butt, or snort it, or do you burn it somehow, or wrap it in something, or eat it? I'm pretty cool, but-- (laughter)

lines.name: OFF-SCREEN
lines.text: Ha! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He leans in really close, one eye half-squinted, going, "I will never understand "you, Scanlan Shorthalt. You're a smart boy. How do you think you use it?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In a pipe of some sort?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sure." And he walks out of the alleyway, really embarrassed that he even did this. The minute you said that, he was like, oh no, I just bought beer for a 12-year-old. He's like, ooh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd like to think that "ha!" was passing that guy coming out of the pub, and getting a second--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, when you get her number, call me or whatever, so we'll meet her later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He walks away and puts his hand up with a-- and keeps walking. You can almost see the hanging head shake as he continues back towards where he was in the tavern.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That went well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That went very well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I got that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You did that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I did it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Mark down one small pocket satchel of suude. S-U-U-D-E.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's for after the dragon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's his own drugs. He's made his own drugs up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Here you go. Right there.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: He made drugs?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, Matt made drugs.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Put a glove on if you're going to get high if you hold it for too long.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a society out there. People are going to continue to find ways to smoke, swallow, or inhale substances.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Definitely not a cop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Definitely not.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Definitely not a cop.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Sometimes you ride the dragon before you kill it.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: (laughs) Exactly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Got to ride the dragon before you ride the dragon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: You've got to ride the dragon before you kill it.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's culture, man. All right, Percy, we need to make some checks for you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, do I have to check even if I'm spending money?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're spending money to fix it, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much money are you spending?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How much do we have? Sorry, I'll stop.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You tell me what you need.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll find out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're the prince of Whitestone. Can't you tap some taxes or something?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could, actually.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I really try not to do that. That's a dick move. People are already iffy on these things, I imagine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Spend everything right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow! That made five decisions and landed on a really good one. That's 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yeah. This is for Bad News?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, Bad News is the only one that is broken. The rest survived.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's fine. For Bad News, the original cost I have here... sorry, have to pull up the PDF to remind me, so I get it right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two electrum.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) I'd put it about at maybe 500 gold worth of materials.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh! Okay. Feel better about that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not a magical implement, but it is expensive.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then I'm going to go and talk to Cassandra, quickly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you make your way to try and find Cassandra, she is actually currently in her room talking with Allura. Talking with Gilmore, with Brom and Drake. There's guards rushing in and out. There's a general sense of ramping energy, as everyone is gathering everything they have at their disposal in preparation for what's going to happen tomorrow.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Where's Raishan?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) You can go look for Raishan, if you like.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: No, I just wanted to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you enter the room, over in the corner, mid-conversation, Cassandra is currently rolling up some papers and handing them to a guard. Turns and finishes a quick bit of conversation whispering off to the side with Drake. Turns around and her eyes meet you and she goes, "Brother."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My lady.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes. What can I do to help you?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're preparing to leave. We are preparing to have a small strike force go underneath the city and do what we can while the other armies hopefully distract, thin the forces and give us a shot at taking care of this once and for all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there anything left in the vaults, potion-wise? Especially healing potions. We don't want to drain you, obviously, but I thought I would make one last push.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see he's currently putting together a big leather package. "Oh! No worry." And he lifts it up on the table. You hear the clanking of glass around on the inside of the satchel. He pulls it down a little bit over the front, pushes to the side and you can see there are two cushioned racks that contain various sizes of vials. "All right, we've got three greater healing potions, one basic "healing potion. That's as much as we can find, to be honest right now. There hasn't been a lot of "trade, and our supply's been limited, and most of what we had has been used by you or folks here in "defense of the city."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You said one basic?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, I've spent my time, knowing what's "coming, and being a focuser of the elemental arts, brewing a few helpful bits here. I wish I had more "time, but our timeline has been a bit accelerated." He pulls out the second cushioned grouping here. The vials are different shapes. It seems like the glass has been scavenged from what was available, but the coloration is similar, and you recognize these. You've had these before. These are four potions of fire resistance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's huge.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's massive.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We will be grateful for you till the end of our days.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, I count on it."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Make sure you don't drink it too soon."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One hour will be all that is necessary.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I certainly hope so. So. That's what I am able to provide for this. I'll be there helping "with some of the distraction, so we'll figure out some of the details for the specific attack, but "we're pulling all that we can for this, and we'll figure out who's going where, who's attacking when "and in what way, I guess, if not tonight, tomorrow." And he looks over to Cassandra and nods. "I'm going to go pray." He leaves the room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I ask a question?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With potions, do they stack? Can you take multiple ones and get multiple benefits, or is it like you take one potion and that's the one potion you get to take?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, if they're different types of potions, I'd say they could stack, to a certain degree. If you just begin to chug four potions in a row I might be asking for some constitution saving throws.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or like a mixed drink, that can get weird, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Things might not--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Long island ice tea of death.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, exactly. Some effects might not mingle well or the urge from your body might reject that much ingestion of enchanted fluid.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Cool. Just checking.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't mix your darks with your clears-- Pick one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't eat the giant toenail at the bottom of the bottle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Exactly. I think that was the-- Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: True.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything else?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd like to just grab Cassandra really quickly and take her aside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. "Yes, brother?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will only take one moment of your time. I've not had a moment to repay you for my part in all of this yet, and if we survive, I owe you much. And if I don't, seal off the city. There is room underneath. Prepare for siege. Prepare to be a safe haven. Do not be-- do what you can to save the city. Do not get involved in the aftermath of this if we fail.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just come back to me."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will do my best. We've-- for centuries, you must know we have survived as realists. And it is very hot down there and I do not like it. Good luck, see you soon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I need you. Return."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I shall. And I go pack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you leave, Vax crosses you in the doorway, as Gilmore is in mid-conversation. Right now with-- well, it was with Drake and then when he'd had the conversation, he watched and Drake left and so he was on his way out following Percival. And you caught him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I steal you for a second?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Certainly."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hi, again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hi."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Remember how we just saw each other a couple of days ago, and I tried to say goodbye, and you told me to promise you that I would see you again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes. And much to my delight, you've kept your promise. And you better keep keeping it."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know what would help with that? Boy, have I got an offer for you. You want to help us save the world? My family and I, we're going to him. And I wasn't sure the path that would take us there. I thought we might be on our own. But we're back here. And you are easily the most impressive arcane user I've ever met in my life. And I want us all to still be breathing in a week. I can't think of anyone better to stand with us than you, Shaun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His eyes look off for a minute. And he reaches up and rubs the back of his neck, and you can see there's still a scar there. He goes, "If I'm to be honest, I've felt a bit useless here in "Whitestone for quite some time. I was there when this all began. It destroyed not just the thing "I've been working to build for so long of my life, but friends, home, for all of us. So it is my just "honor, and vengeful glee, to join you on the siege to Emon, if you will have me?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gesundheit. I'm so glad to have you with us, friend. So glad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just stay alive. Keep that promise."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It will be a little bit easier now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good." And he smacks you on the cheek.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good time for a musical quote.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (singing) Stay alive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He smacks you on the cheek and goes, "Learned that from you. All right then, I guess "I've got to gather my supplies and-- Oh, it's been a while since I've seen some-- I've never "actually seen combat on this scale before when, you know, I wasn't just trying to run away? So "let's see if I can knock off the old dust."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm sure it will be glorious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, I can guarantee it."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Plug.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm wondering if we should eat a Heroes' Feast tonight, and then just eat one again tomorrow? 'Cause we just don't know what's going to happen during the day anymore. Just a Heroes' Feast every night. Be ready, and just, you know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yep. Do we have the money for that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's, yeah. We're fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was looking forward to a Heroes' Brunch, personally.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Either one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bagels and lox?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Heroes' High Tea.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Eggs Benedict with lots of extra hollandaise.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Capers of might.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What else do you guys wish to prepare, if anything?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Holy shit, man!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have our potions. Should we split them up?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who needs fire giant, I mean fire resistance, the most?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. We have five potions of fire resistance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, because we already had one. Now, we have two superior, five regular healing, and three greater. What we also have is a potion of invulnerability, which is clutch, and a potion of speed. We need to decide who to give the potion of invulnerability to, because it lasts for ten minutes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, one minute. I'm pretty sure, I'll check, but that's a powerful-ass potion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can't die, right, when you take it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You wish!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, can you take damage when you've got it going? It's like a minute of no damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take damage, you have resistance to all damage, so all damage you take is halved.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Should that be decided mid-battle? Clutch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That one seems like a specific task.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a specific task kind of thing. So we'll decide that later?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There is an item. And I'm currently holding it, and I don't know if I'm the best person to be holding this. But I'm just going to pass this down the line to see if anyone has an opinion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's the sword.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is too bad, I can't wield this fucker.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't wield a sword either.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a dex-based sword, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Sword of Dragon-Slaying?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. Or it can switch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm allowing it to switch if need be.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe this is the thing to hand to Grog. And one minute of invulnerability with that is possibly the cruellest thing that dragon will have ever experienced.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The thing is, if he's raging, I don't know if he'll think to switch over.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, it's an attuned weapon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He isn't resistant to fire while he's raging.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, but he has resistance to physical damage, and if he takes a potion of fire resistance, is he pretty much covered the same way if he's raging and has a fire potion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Possibly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I could use this because it's dex-based, if I so choose?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you can't do three attacks with it, because it's bigger?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, yeah. You would have one attack with that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One attack, but not-- I can't do longsword and then a dagger?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could do longsword and then a bonus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's pretty cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me check, I don't know if he can do them all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could he do Whisper and then attack with the dragon sword?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know how many items you have attuned at the moment?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Just two, I believe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So you could go for a triple?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I could. Well, I have my shadow spear. But my nec, so you'd want the nec damage from that, is what you'd be looking for. I don't know if I could wield the two of them together?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a one-handed sword, so I'm not sure. What is your--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has to be a light melee weapon in both hands, it looks to do this, unless you have a feat to fix that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have the-- Do you have Dual Wielder as a feat?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so yes, you can use the longsword and Whisper in the other hand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But it's attunement, so I have to choose something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd have to chose that over--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This would supersede Whisper. Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What? Whisper is a Vestige.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I understand that, but this is very strong, and with wings I could go anywhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically I'm allowing-- Actually, no, I'm allowing it to be a finesse.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're allowing it? You're allowing it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, because it's strength or dex. I'm sticking to my choice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. So it's light.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not light. It's finesse. Meaning you can choose strength or dexterity.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I have a question. Last time I saw you, you were looking for the Vestiges.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Did you find them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All of them!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Do you know what to do with them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They are all super powerful, and are awesome, and you'll see them in battle tomorrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's all we know, is that you fight with them. That's all we know. Why, do you know more?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Is there any information we can glean from Osysa at all, in Vasselheim, of how to use them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, it would mean traveling to Vasselheim.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: That's true. Is there any way to get there, just quick and bamf in and just--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Last time we went somewhere quick and bamfed in--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: It was a long time?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Things went poorly. But we could speak to her. We could talk to her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One of us could go and bamf back. And be back tomorrow morning.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Well, you said you used them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we've been using them

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: So then you know what they do, for the most part, right?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Why waste a trip?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What if there's a way to combine them?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: That didn't work? Piling them on top of each other didn't work?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They didn't become a robot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not as much as we hoped it would, no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. There are other Vestiges, too, that are out there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have a potion of haste, yeah?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, potion of speed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What if you gave me that and I gave you my boots?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Real quick, who needs the fire protection?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I don't; I'm resistant.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we have plenty of potions, I'll take it so I don't have to use a concentration spell.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ditto. My plan is to stay away from the fire, but if I can't, that would certainly help.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: My plate is partially fire resistant.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vex? You don't need it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fire resistance?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Didn't I give you that? Oh, I gave you cold resistance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I need fire resistance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What did you give me?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Chlamydia.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Acid resistance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yeah, that's right.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Sorry. I was just in Australia. I got it from a koala. I'm kidding.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could take off my bracers--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's up to you. I don't want to--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's also the discussion--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What. More discussions?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You take the boots, I'm on the potion. I have Whisper and this sword.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we going to try and lure Thordak out of his lair as a challenger?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we're going to sneak into his lair, right?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: You're going to corner it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's not going to leave his lair anymore; he knows we're coming

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: So, just very briefly, what is the plan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The plan, as I understated it, is: we send a vicious army to attack at the gates, all over the place, drawing out Thordak's forces in an epic battle. Blood, sinew, and gore everywhere, while we slip under the city, unbeknownst to Thordak, in the tunnels with the Clasp leading us. Leading us right to the center of town where we pop up, and surprise Thordak! He didn't know we were coming! He thought that there was an army at the gates! And we stab him real quick and leave.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Done. And we also find whatever it is he's protecting and kill that too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And at some point Raishan comes and helps us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey! What's up?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: How you doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm really sorry. About all of that.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: No, it's no problem. It's great.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I have a question. Do I know about the machine? Have I been told about that? Did Raishan tell me about that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which one?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: The machine that Thordak is building, or whatever the heck he's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thordak, as far as you know, has let nobody down there, Raishan included. And you have no idea what machinations Thordak is--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: But I do know about it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, you know as much as they do. It's come up in conversation previously, yes.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: And you said we're going into the tunnels? Does anyone know the way through the tunnels?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Clasp does. They're an order of rogues and thieves who hate us. But they're going to help us.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Do you trust them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We totally trust them because they are scoundrels and liars. And we have no other choice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It doesn't serve them to lie to us.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: This sounds like a wonderful plan!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: It doesn't serve the scoundrels and liars to lie and be scoundrels?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It doesn't serve them in this moment, no. You know, if you're always a liar and a scoundrel, then no one will ever trust you to do anything, they're only conveniently liars and scoundrels.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I love this plan, this is great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs) It's pretty air-tight.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Yeah. I don't see any room for problems. So you want to go in and corner the dragon where he lives and is most powerful--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, yes!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: His back to the wall, and no escape--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He can escape at any moment, he can fly.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Just us, though? Not the entire army which we are using as a diversion?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just a partial group. Yes!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: But the scoundrels are going to lead us to him?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, he has his own army.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So we need to keep his army distracted so we're not fighting a dragon and an army. So those armies will hopefully either distract the armies or; if he chooses not to send the armies to fight the rest of the armies that we've brought, all of our armies also converge on the dragon's nest and then we have everybody there.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: You're engaging all of your forces in one play? If he holds his forces back, why not send in skirmishes to see what happens first?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I like this plan. He's good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, we have people that we can do for that. Although, it's not just one army we have. We have groups of them, technically. I was just--

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Attacking in one place?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, no. All around the city.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Is there a weak point?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't you laugh! No! No! You don't get to laugh. That scares us. Sadly, the only weak point is--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We either go with the shitty hand we've been given, or we lie down and let him steamroll over us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, but we can also try and formulate at least a vague plan, so that we all don't die within a single--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think this is a vague plan so that we don't all die.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, okay. Let's build off of what Kash has.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If it's too specific, then it's going to go wrong too quickly--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on, hang on. He's right.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Plus we don't know what to expect. We have to be ready for anything.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: And hopefully they're going to take us to corner the giant thing that wants to kill all of us, in the place where he is the most powerful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that one!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm actually very okay with this plan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should have him with us always! (laughter)

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I totally agree.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do it! Let's do that, let's do that!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Let's do that! Okay! Great plan! Oh my god! Who's in charge? Who's leading your ground forces?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have no leader. Except we do have a secret weapon: we have a dragon who definitely wants something that we don't know about. Who might or might not be working with us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We also have another secret weapon!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have two dragons.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have a sword that is a dragon-slaying sword.

lines.name: LIAM, MARISHA
lines.text: A whole other dragon.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: We should just kill each other now and just save the trouble. We got to plan something!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan, you do remember the flute, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I carry it with me always. I use it all the time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wonder how long it'll take? To bamf over when we play the flute? Is it instantaneous or is it like, it takes a day?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll never know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll be dead long before it works.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Six months later, "Where is everybody?" (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I told you we were going to die if we didn't have you.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: No, you're going to die even with me! But I'm going to be the guy going, "Hey, we could have "planned this better!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, yeah.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I think you've given them a really good plan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, no, that's great! Let's do that!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There is no situation that anyone is going to come up with where we're looking good, and this is going to work well. There's just-- there's a dragon in the middle of the city with an evil army and we have to deal with it, and there's just no positive way to deal with that.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Are we taking Raishan with us?

lines.name: SAM
