lines.text: Raishan, I feel like she's going to meet us there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It just seems so highly defeatist to already plan for-- you know, defeat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not planning for defeat. It's recognizing that no matter what, ten minutes into it, everything that we thought we knew is going to be wrong anyway.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: At least tell me you're not going to send all your forces in at the same time. You're saving a reserve.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Then we need to talk about the forces that are going in. More armies are talented than others.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're not sending them all in?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, we're not. We are going to surround the city.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I need one supreme general who's going to be in charge of everything. Who stays back as we're attacking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Daxio is going to do that.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: And the men trust him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. He's the leader of the army.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's all right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then we need to get this plan to him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we need to talk to him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have communications.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we're going to have waves of assault from one position, have other people flank in from another position--

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: And you're attacking a fortified city?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fortified-ish. Well, the hope is actually-- also we have the 50 men from Fort Daxio. We can bring them in underground as well, and just have them pop up--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And open the gates?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: --all sorts of places. Also open the gates.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: So you could bring forces with us to come up in the middle of the city?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: That's good. We should have talked about that in the beginning.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I also think there's a SWAT team that's available to us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He thinks there's a SWAT team.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: You should-- you should talk less.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Smile more? (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think you smile just the right amount.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I use my Awakened Mind to speak to Kash telepathically. You can't respond out loud, so don't. You know how I feel about Raishan. You know what I've experienced with her. Keep an eye on her. Don't trust her. If you see anything while we're out there, you let me know and we'll take her out. All right, darling?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kash, why are you drooling and staring off into space? (laughter)

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Was-- was I drooling?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, just a little.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: That's my bad, I'm sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You were talking so much a second ago, and--

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I was thinking about how I can't wait to die tomorrow. Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, why don't we finalize this plan tomorrow when we meet with the general who will be-- what, commanding half the forces?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think we need to meet with the general, like, tonight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Let's go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Meet or telepathically communicate?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we should send a message through Allura. She can just scribble a note and send it to him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Also that way, he'll have less time, less effort defying us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why-- why not go talk to him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I feel like you can't really scribble an elaborate battle plan in a 25-word message.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not written down, it's all telepathic conversation.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not exactly-- She can't have a full-blown conversation with them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a long-distance Twitter.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. A hundred percent.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go to him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just in case.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When Vex wants to spend money, I'm in agreement.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's the difference, really? Just to be prepared.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, it blows a spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But the day is almost up. It will protect us all day tomorrow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What time is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After this much conversation, it's getting closer to sunset, probably an hour after--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oi, Pike! Can you do a Heroes Feast for us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sure!" (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thanks, Pike!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No problem!"

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, she then goes ahead and casts Heroes' Feast. Same cost. Same cost as-- It also cost her 6th-level spell slot. Which I'll mark.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't have to, we have party funds for this, dear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So Heroes' Feast has been summoned for you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you just give me 800? I'm just pocketing your 800, and I'm putting it in the party gold. So thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's the same thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys are going to speak to Allura, then?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. We're doing a Heroes' Feast.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I was told there was brunch.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I was promised brunch!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we know exactly where the Syngorn army is? How far away from--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That, you would have to talk to Allura about. She's acting as the information nexus for everyone. It takes an hour. You all have to sit and devour the meal for an hour, for 12 people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For your party, your two allies there, and Gilmore, and Jarett, Drake, anybody else you want to bring along. And as you guys, for the next 24 hours--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Trinket.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you need it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Wait. That was you at the beginning? (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shh-shhh--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kima-- you'd have to choose between Kima or Jarett.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or Kima or Trinket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have to choose between Kima and Jarett to come? Or to eat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To eat. You only have up to 12 people for the meal.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kima. She's in the fray.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. He can stay back, he has a crossbow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, so, that being the case, gonna roll 2d10 to see how much everyone's maximum hit points increases.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, we don't need to do Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's not here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a really good roll. That's an eight and a nine. So there you go. All of you gain 17 additional max hit points for the next 24 hours.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow, that's awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's actually really, really good. So keep a note on that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then we're immune to fear and poison, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you're immune to poison and the poisoned condition.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And we have advantage on wisdom saving throws.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, I'm marking this here.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I feel so much healthier. And the bacon is great. Fresh lox.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Zabar's.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm so hungry now!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Hollandaise wasn't that blender stuff, it was the real thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you finish your meal. You summon Allura, she comes and enters the room. She looks a little frazzled, a little sleepless, but she's keeping it together. "All right, what do you "require?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We were curious if you knew the location of the Syngorn army?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Their illusionists have been keeping a blanket in "front of the army to dissuade any visibility and giving away their position in advance."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's so comforting.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: You have numbers?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They are at-- let's see here, they're at 2,000 troops."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Give or take, and--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you know the status of the other armies?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, that is the Syngorian force and the three Daxio-- the Dusk regiment, the Tide "regiment-- The Dusk, the Gale, and the Tide regiments with the Syngorian forces."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And all together is 2,000?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes. A little over 2,000."

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Are they all foot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They are all foot, yes. Unfortunately, with the time given, and the transition to and from the "Feywild, there was an inability to bring with them most of their beasts of burden and horses. Many of "them were left to scatter shortly after the Conclave's attack."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there an elite SWAT team task force?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I believe that's-- there is one, and they are called Vox Machina."

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I've heard of them.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Are there shields?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They do have shields."

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: How big?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Uh, depends on the regiments. I mean--"

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Can we form a phalanx, is my question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I-- Yes, that is--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He has been training military in Whitestone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Specifically the Tide regiment is a frontline shield phalanx."

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: And how big is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd have to talk to Mikael on that. The "Warmaster."

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: And they're going to be attacking a fortified location?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, the outer walls of Emon are guarded by a wall. The wall has sustained damage through the "Conclave's initial attack and there has not been, as far as I know, intent to rebuild, or at least a "force to be able to since then."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So if we could get in, talk to the Clasp, and have them find a way to open the gates, it would help the armies.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Well, that's the thing, is you'd have to hold the gate once it's open. That's gonna be the hardest part. But 50 men could easily do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus the Clasp, which hopefully will be willing to fight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, where's our stone golem?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Far away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's gone.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: How many-- do we know the numbers that are inside the city?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not specifically. As far as the lizardfolk army-- from what we've heard from Asum, from Brom, "from Raishan, the estimates are somewhere in the neighborhood of eight to nine thousand, and at "least five to six hundred wyverns that are--"

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: So we don't control the air?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not on a wide scale, no."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have a single battleship.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: We're attacking a fortified location with no siege engines, outnumbered three to one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Their fortified location also does not have siege engines, just air force.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Their air force is also giant wyvern beasts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now, understand, lizardfolk are not the most hearty, the most well-trained. They're a "chaotic force at best and even the bit of unification they've had under Thordak's banner is "thin. You've already had luck cutting down a few of their main sources of tactics; I believe the "general that you slew outside of Daxio was one of their main organisers. That's a big blow to their "tactic brigade. Who knows who else is in cahoots with Thordak since he took power, but we've been, "in previous encounters, chipping away at their capabilities. Thordak also does have under his "command a number of fire giants that he brought with him from the Fire Plane. However, you also "slew their general."

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Are they superstitious?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not to my knowledge, no."

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Any type of religion; a devil figure in their religion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There are. They exist among many various devils."

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Scatter fear among all of them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It could work. The big fear there of course is that they work for a creature they already fear quite a bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think Thordak might be scarier than any of their gods at this point.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Thordak will be busy, hopefully. We want to move them away from the gate so that the 50 men can come up through the city and hold the gate.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think a carrot would be easier than a stick. I think it would be better to find a force for them to rush toward, than to find something for them rush away from.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we know how many spellcasters are in the Syngorn army?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do not have those numbers, unfortunately."

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: That could be interesting.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: More carrot, less stick.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: You might not even need to see the soldiers, just the dust rising from their boots.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: And the horses charging, if you can make that kind of illusion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We need to figure out how many spellcasters.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That would be a conversation with the Warmaster."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They can throw down long-range, large, covering spells.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go talk to the Warmaster.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well we don't know where they'll be exactly until tomorrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Have that conversation at the ready."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, hang on, how about this? We know that they're to arrive in Emon by the afternoon. We can just try to connect with them in the early morning and march in with them, then split when we get closer to the gates.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then meet the 50 men at Greyskull Keep.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Do we have access to anything that goes boom?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A little bit. Do I have anything possibly still leftover at Greyskull, any of my supplies?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do have a small cache of blackpowder at your disposal. It's about a cask.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I make it myself, half the time.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: A cask in the right place against an already damaged wall could punch a hole.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It could.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: And if we're underneath, and the foundation is already weakened, we'd be trapped but the army could get inside.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you still have that siege arrow or is that gone now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do, I have a siege arrow. And Grog does extra damage against buildings and walls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes I do!" (boom) slams his fists together, and as they hit you hear what sounds like a very localized sound of a rockslide. Just like (boom).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Rad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So we do have a siege arrow which will basically do the damage of-- It's a wall-shatterer. It's designed to bring down stone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So it damages stone, specifically? The siege arrow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. It damages anything that is liable to siege.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: And it can be fired by anybody?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, but it is weirdly weighted and she's probably the one you want firing it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm a really good archer.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I remember, when I brought you back from the dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, oh my god thank you so much.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: You're welcome, not a problem.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What am I, chopped liver? I get nothing? I think it was both of us, I believe.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: That could be interesting, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes it could. I'd forgotten about that.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Well because what they'll be expecting is for 50 men to come in and hold the gate. What if holding the gate is actually a distraction? And then we punch a hole through the wall and go in the back door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. I like it.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: But we're going to be in the tunnel, we're working about the top right now.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: But if we can scatter their forces front and back, we'll have the center to come in underneath, and that way if they figure it out they'll have to come from either side.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: The 50 men holding the wall, the chances of any of them getting out are slim, but they're going to know that going in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: These guys are legit!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We are the worst people.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Apparently! Which is terrible. It really, really is.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: It's the end of the world, they know what's happened.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: You've been dealing with dragons, we've been thinking about it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm still concerned we don't have enough air support for the 500 wyverns.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I think we might have to let that go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Allura chimes in and goes, "As far as I understand, that's part of the reason you're "bringing the mages with you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, well I'm thinking--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ground to air.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: How big is the airship?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wasn't wanting to necessarily tap into this resource unless necessary, but I think it's necessary. I can contact the Air Ashari and have them specifically on air support.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And they can get themselves here quick, like you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They can go through trees, instant!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It can hold two dozen people on that ship, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need all of the Ashari.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's about three cannonade?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Is there anyone that could put an illusion on the airship to make it seem like another dragon?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could put a slight illusion on it but it'd be pretty easy--

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I'm just wondering if there's a way to draw their air force to the airship and then blow it up?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We also supposedly have a green dragon as an ally.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I fucking forgot the Ravenites said they would help us, too! I just remembered.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we sent word to them, didn't we? Didn't we send word to everybody?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You sent word to a few specific entities, not the Ravenites.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long would it take?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck. Are they too far?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're like a continent away.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Wait, you can bring in air force?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can contact my father at the Air Ashari.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do that. We also need to contact Gilmore.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: If you control the air, you control the battle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Gilmore is accompanying you, and I believe Kima is going to come along as well".

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We also have your friend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The airship we don't know quite exactly where it is and when it will arrive. I don't know "if we can count on it being there by the time you make this assault, but they're going there as soon "as they can."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It has cannonade as well and it is designed to hold sieges in the air, so it will keep many of them busy, and they're not that bright.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: If it's not coming though, you can't count it among them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can't count on anything.That would be--

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Huge.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you message Korren?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've not met Korren."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you could take me to him--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh-huh. Yeah, right. Yes. Because we're not leaving until the morning now. Sure, yeah. Oh man (gasps) who wants to go see my hometown, you guys?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (dubious noise)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can show you where I went to school!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Keyleth, we need to get back here as soon as possible.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: You went to school? (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was catty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We were like back in school suddenly, that was great!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I formally apologize.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we expecting you back tonight?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: And the rest of us can rest, yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Rest and prepare for everything you can, for tomorrow this happens." (liquid pouring)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I just saw it out of the corner, it was great!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All you had to do was ask, I'm working toward getting the break, buddy!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sigh) Feels so much better!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Before we go to bed, I would like to talk to Vex very quickly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are going to prepare to make your way to the Air Ashari, Zahra pulls you aside.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Darling?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I have major concerns about Raishan. I don't know that we can trust her, I just want you to keep your eyes on her. While you were gone, I tried as hard as I could to glean anything from her, and the closer I thought I got-- I found out that I knew nothing about her. And she knows everything about me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She knows everything about all of us, dear.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Don't trust her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not even for a minute.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Don't trust her. If it comes to it, I'll go down taking her out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'd rather you didn't.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: So would I.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have to do it, I have to insight check Zahra to make sure she's really Zahra!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No that's good. That's good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pretty good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can also say there's an easy way to do this--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Turn that way real fast.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just go downstairs.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (in surfer accent) Hey guys, don't forget: December's theme is "revolution!" Featuring items from Assassin's Creed, Mr. Robot, Firefly and more! Don't forget to go to lootcrate.com/criticalrole, and enter 'critical role' for 10% off, my bruh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When did you even speak to her?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: While you were gone. You know I've been spending time-- she's been down in the ziggurat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: So I've seen her. I've seen her form, as I guess you have as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: After Rimefang, I sort of became obsessed with dragons.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know the feeling. (laughs)

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes, it's a wonderful feeling, isn't it? But I also know that she was part of it, and the minute a dragon says 'trust me' is the minute you don't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Especially her.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Especially her. So while you were gone, I tried. I tried to find out as much about Thordak as I could.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just know that we don't trust her.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't even know if she's really sick.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I actually believe her in that respect. But Thordak is the only one that can cure her, and if that's the case-- if she believes that-- then we are nothing. We are expendable to her the minute she sees Thordak. That's the carrot that he has put in front of her, is that 'I will heal you', and he hasn't done it yet. I don't think he will.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think he really can.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: If he does, we're fucked. That's all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're not alone in this, at least.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Good. That's good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's not our friend.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: She can be persuasive. Thank you, darling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You separate for the evening to gather your mind, gather your supplies and prepare for the coming battle. While the rest of you find yourselves resting for the evening, Keyleth and Vax find yourselves walking towards the Sun Tree to make your journey.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is Allura coming with us, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to ask her to come with you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought she was.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sorry, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She doesn't have to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're right, no, she goes with you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, come on, Allura, let's go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course! Certainly."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's great, we have these really great crepes that we make. It's like our hometown special.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't know if we'll have time."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take a few steps toward the village. Probably close to 100 homes at most, built into the mountainside. It goes up into a hill with trees that surround the outskirts of it. You see small lights that are lit throughout so it has this firefly feel glimmering through. As soon as you step maybe ten or 15 feet from the tree, the wind just stops.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What happened to the wind?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, we're Air Ashari, we don't have to live in a hellscape our whole lives! Come on, we control it, it's great! (sighs) Doesn't it smell good? It smells so fresh up here, you know? You don't have to deal with the pollution down there. Oh look! Over there, that's where I learned to shapeshift into a squirrel for the first time--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Keyleth? Keyleth. We're here on business--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah no, then let's start walking!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Please lead on."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, yeah. And over there was the first time that my dad taught me how to fly. He just pushed me off the cliff--!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have my hand on her back and I just start--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently there is nobody you see visible walking through the city, most everything is closed off for the night. The little lantern-like lights you saw before are coming from the inside of these buildings.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a quiet mountain town, everything closes at like five, it was actually annoying growing up.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: You live in South Pointe?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I told you it was remote!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I want both of you to roll a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 14 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As she's talking and you guys are walking, you notice a little dark spot, just covering past the stars, arcing quickly in your direction.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's that? Do you know what that is? Is that normal?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I know what that is, is that normal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Once you see it, you recognize the trajectory of it. This is a person rocketing toward you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No really, is this normal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's normal for you, because this is a person riding a skysail.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, it is normal for me? Oh, like a--? Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the person swoops up and then lands-- it's a sort of glider. It resembles a pogo stick in the fact that feet are placed on top of it, and elements are grasped on the side. It's a large, leather-winged structure that immediately folds up and is held like a staff to the side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whoa, that's nifty! Hi!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Standing before you is Korren, your father.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dad!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks surprised. He lands in a very aggressive, coming-to-see-what's-going-on-type way, and as soon as he looks, "Keyleth! I wasn't expecting--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi! Village looks great! I see you guys have been keeping up with the landscaping, this is awesome. Hi, how are you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He hugs you, but it's a tense hug and he pats your shoulder. "We're good. I--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's wrong?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, things as they are, I know you're probably here for not a passing visit. Am I "correct in this assumption?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, I guess you could say it was going to be passing in that we don't have a lot of time. We're here to ask for help, for the Air Ashari's aid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We were waiting for specific word based on our last conversation. We have ways of finding "information about what's going on in the world, with the armies that have been mounting making "their way towards Emon we've been keeping a watch on the gathering energy toward the west coast of "Tal'dorei. We were preparing ourselves. So if you've come to ask for our aid, we're ready."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why do I sense trepidation in your voice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Because we know what we face. Because my daughter is going to war against something that we "watched tear through the countryside not long after you were born. I'm just concerned as a "parent. That is all."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You sent me on this path to prove myself worthy and a hero. I'm following what I thought you wanted of me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You are, and I'm proud of you. I just want to do what I can to help safeguard that."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I will continue my duties as I promised from the beginning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course".

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As those supersede being your daughter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I am here for unfortunate reasons, and I wish I wasn't. We need the best. We need as many of the top soldiers that we have. I'm looking at you, at my people, for air support. There's about five, maybe six hundred, maybe even more wyverns covering the city. So far we don't have a lot of options.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We can probably facilitate this request."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was hoping maybe some of the best nature manipulators could create a hazardous storm ahead of time? See what we can do to take out as much in bulk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We can do that. Yeah."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) She went to school.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, I got educated!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We can do that. When is this set to happen?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tomorrow afternoon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, we'll get our conjurers together and begin building a storm front. We'll send it "mid-day tomorrow. Then what sign should we look for to enter the fray?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just anything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A flare, we have flares. Kiki, we have flares.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well." (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're spitballing this as we go, dad. So we can work on a sign together, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sure, I mean, if we're creating a sky of rain and darkness, just make the sky itself a sign."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Something I'd know, something I'd recognize."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We'll go in there and tear as many of those wyverns as we can to the ground."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're not alone, there is an army of elves marching as we speak.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Syngorn army.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We've seen them traversing. Their illusions are strong but their illusions are faced towards "the city. We have the luxury of knowing their magic. So, yes."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With all due respect, if you have seen through their illusion, does that mean-- I'm sure many of Thordak's spies could do the same?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It depends on who he has on his side. I hope that's not the case."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, me too. Are you going to come as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We have enough to spare for this and protect our people. Besides, as you well know, the "protections in this village prevent wayward fliers."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. This is Vax, by the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We've met."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good to see you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He came with me. So--? Yeah. See you tomorrow, I guess?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "See you tomorrow."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A great many people are grateful for your aid, as am I.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And I'm grateful for yours."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're a good man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Prove to me you're one as well." (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cleaning the shotgun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But we have a lot to plan, I'm sure you do as well."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good night." He pulls you in and kisses you on the forehead, and gives you a long look.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just give him a big hug in response.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He holds you there for a second, then looks back over at you as he's holding her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just nod my head.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I miss you, Dad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I miss you, too. When all this is done, do you still intend to finish your Aramente? Do it "quickly. Come back to us, please. You're missed."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have my word. I won't let you down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I know. Anyway." He slams on the ground and the leather flares out into arcing-looking fingers, and he steps on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are these the new models? They've really upgraded them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, you've just been gone for a while."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have I been gone that long?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You've been gone a while."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, they look great!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, all right, okay, bye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good night." As the wind picks up under him, the skysail begins to lift and glide off. He heads back toward the village.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is fucking cool. We should get out of here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we should.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Allura?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, I believe we should. Well, it was nice to meet him."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that's right. Sorry, I should have introduced you, I guess.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As are the expected pleasantries of diplomacy. But it seems you had it all taken care "of, so it's fine."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, I got distracted by talking to you as my father and not as Allura!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's all right, don't worry, it is a bit cold, if we could get back please?" She's rubbing her shoulders and arms a bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was my dad, let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you guys head back, exiting out the Sun Tree, making your way back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I catch her by the arm. I can't wait to come back. Let's go!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: When we come back, I'll have to show you the first time I--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's go! Let's go, please! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way back to castle Whitestone, preparing your materials, your weapons, your minds and your disposition for the coming war tomorrow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a quick thing!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit, Taliesin, shit!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I knock on Vex's door. I have a bag, and I go to Vex's door and knock on her door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hello, who is it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a bag of dicks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're terrible. It's me, I have something to show you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (faux surprise) Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I'm an evil green dragon, let me in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you here for our later talk?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No this is a very-- open the door, I have something to show you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fine. I open the door completely naked!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What was it, dear?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) It's a power play, I love it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't remember but it was mostly to head in this direction. Can I come in?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure, of course! Would you like to talk before, or after?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And this is a snow mead. And this is Green Tear Whiskey.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Drink the Courage one now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to start with the Courage and not talk about dragons. And I run in and shut the door. You just stepped on the whole thing, didn't you? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was beautiful!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I can't wait for the artwork! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will be expecting labels for all of them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can't always be in control, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I can't. It's beautiful.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Not when Vex is around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So we'll get that to you very soon. Go ahead and make sure to contact some of the crew here, or the mods, and get your information to get this out to you ASAP, so congratulations. And thank you once again, Wyrmwood, for making this possible.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And by ASAP we mean as soon as we get out the other 20 packages we need to get out and then you're in the queue! Welcome to being in line.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like the kickstarter you didn't sign up for. It's coming!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I didn't want this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Get my music situated here. [very loud music] Oh my, volume! So, as you all slowly come to consciousnesses the following morning, well-rested for the most part. You gather your supplies, you prepare whatever else you prepared before, making your way to the coming battle. So, what do you guys want to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go to the coming battle?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, if you have all your things situated, you wait throughout the day, anxiously, eating your meal, looking to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why is the music so--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The music is intense here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is he here now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I attack Zahra!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I use Witch Bolt on Scanlan!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like that random Final Fantasy encounter just happened and you're like, I only got ten feet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just got out of the shop.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: And in that moment, we fall in love.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: If it's the

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Every J-RPG.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't think this is mine, either.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this just a radio station that we're picking up?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: You're listening to the sounds of Whitestone.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: On WNBC radio!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: This is dragon radio. Giving a shout-out to the Conclave, Vox Machina...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Warmaster Mikael Daxio is awaiting your arrival.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a question. I have a question. I'm going to attune the Boots of Haste that I took from my brother just now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That your brother gave to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That my brother gave to me. And if I un-attune my Coldsnap Armor, do I just lose the cold resistance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And any sort of armor bonus that it gave you. I mean, you would still have the armor. Like, if it's leather armor, it would give you a bonus of two to your AC. But if it's a plus two armor, you would lose the plus two on top of the actual armor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a big drop. I'm going to take my bracers off, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're doing two less damage per attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's smarter. That's wise.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'm going to attune my Charred Dark Staff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I'm going to go ahead and attune to my cape, instead of my ring.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm attuning the dragon sword, and I want to use it a little bit just so I don't get pantsed in the moment. Does it work all right; am I all right with this? It's awfully large.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's bigger than what you're used to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Do you want to spar?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But even still--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It won't do a bonus to him. He's not a dragon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, I'd like to, but do we have time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could give it a shot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so the two of you square off briefly out in the streets just outside of the guard barracks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I whisper in my brother's ear.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just be careful because-- What? What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nothing. What were you going to say?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Be careful; I think he has a grudge against you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just go. You'll be great.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Am I fighting you or your sister?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's really the same thing, at all times.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I use Awakened Mind and I say, Kash, go easy on him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Oh, shit.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: We're going easy. I just want to make sure that you and your blade are one before you go into battle. It's a bad time to find out you don't know how to use it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll an attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is-- Is this a sneak attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, it's just 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so yeah. So, as you say that, he smiles, and before you even notice, you hear a ping! and you feel a slight vibration into your lower pauldron, and you look down and the sword has not hurt you, but it has definitely pierced the plates behind the armor and he's showing, he's posturing that he already has availability with the blade between your armor.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Interesting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Evasion!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Just jump right to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Where's Vox Machina?" "Well, um. They killed each other. It's weird." (laughter) So as you both stand there, in a moment, squaring off, the tension still in the city from the coming event, but people are starting to look out and gather. They're having a "Morpheus is fighting Neo" moment as people are starting to pull others from nearby buildings, and gather in a small circle around.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I go up to Vex, and go: why-- Why is this happening? Is this happening for, like, a-- Did they tell you-- Did they tell you the reason?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're fighting over you, darling. They're fighting over you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can tell-- I've been with you for a long time. I can tell when you're lying to me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They both professed their love and now they're fighting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Now you're patronizing me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (calls) We're really not that far away! Are we going to do this? You ready?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I'm ready when you are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's making the first move?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Me. Are we doing initiative or attacks? I don't even know what this is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The initiative was whoever said "me" first, so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I didn't know how badly I wanted this until now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Boy, I did.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, man, what are we fighting to? Here we go. So that is the first and that is-- I'm going to use Luck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're about to fight a fucking dragon! You're fighting Kash!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do realize-- You only have-- You're spending your Luck for--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I spent it already. Just so we're clear, everybody-- I'm going to switch back to Liam-- This is a game! This is a game. Which camera's on me?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Your fun is wrong.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Your fun is very wrong.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So it's an 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: An 18. What's your armor class? With your shield?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: My armor class is 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you go to strike with the sword--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. With your sword. And so now you're attacking with your--?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural 20, with Whisper.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, he's suddenly much closer than you expected, and you feel the blade shirk the side of the armor. So for the purposes of this, we're not rolling damage because it's to spar--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But the blade hits and pokes just enough where you know that's maybe-- That's where the kidney is.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Right, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And in that brief moment, you see the little creeping smile up the side of his mouth. You go ahead and roll your attack now, Kashaw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Plus, well, if I'm using my-- I don't want to use the shadow spear. Should we use-- Let's not do nec damage on him, let's think. It's just a regular plus two, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So what is he at?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it's a plus two spear. What's your attack bonus altogether?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Oh, with the attack bonus is plus ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's 28.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: 28 to you, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that definitely hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so, after you get the blade there, there's that moment of posturing. How do you deflect him off?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I think, yeah, the blade comes in, he's got his spear, so as the blade comes in, he slaps his arm away and just takes it right lightly across the chest so it just cuts into the little bit of fat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just-- (slicing noise). You back away and you see two of the mantle-like dark feathers of your armor, the very tips just go-- (puff)

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I cast Eldritch Blast, two beams, right in front of either one of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are having this moment, all of a sudden the ground detonates before you. In a haze of greenish-white arcane energy, you see now these small basketball-sized concave blast craters in the ground before each of you, and right off to the side you see Zahra standing, staff in one hand, hand before her with the other.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're so nice.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I use Thaumaturgy to go fire with my eyes.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: We're just playing.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: All right, boys. Enough. I appreciate it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, we'll play slap and tickle later.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Let's do this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Anyway, sword works. Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you sheath the sword. So you guys gather the rest of your materials together.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We still have that spare sword that was just that standard rapier that was just in the bag before from the general, correct?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog has the Bag of Holding, and I don't know what's in it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we have it. We still have just a very standard nothing, where it's barely a plus one--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's barely enchanted.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What'd you need it for?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just in case someone gets close enough to me that it's complicated.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a shortsword, but that sounds better.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's probably better. It's whatever Stonefell had.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shortsword is dex-based, so you're going to probably want to run with that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I need to roll really fast to recharge my Spire. So I'm going to do that, real fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. And actually, you should roll to recharge your wand.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It goes all the way up. It is full again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I rolled four plus four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Twice, actually, for two nights of rest, so.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: "My spire's full."

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: "So is mine."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven. So I'm back up to normal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All righty. As you guys are preparing, Gilmore comes out. He's usually dressed in his usual casual flowing robes. Or his wizard tracksuit-type outfit. The outfit you see on him, it's more ornamental. And it's, specifically more so than you've seen him wear, it has a very similar design and presentation of some of the more noble individuals you saw wandering Marquet, Ank'Harel in particular. He seems to be going more ceremonial than you're used to seeing Gilmore.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What color are the robes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, they are very much purple and gold. He keeps to his aesthetic. But the design is definitely ceremonial; different than anything you've seen him wear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Full Bollywood.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that's what I was thinking about!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it his old boy scout uniform or what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well, I guess today's the day."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Be pleased.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How are we going to get there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Be pleased."

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Are we speaking to the general first?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we're going there first. But not via a tree, we have to go via something else.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why not via a tree?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a tree on the battlefield where they are?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, it's not a battlefield.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If not, we'll have to talk to Allura. I'm going to scry real quick! Scrying Eye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who are you scrying on?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can't hide from my scrying eyes. Your dad. What's his name? Syldor, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's his full title.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you scry Syldor. You have a bit of a flash of green, lots of green, endless green. Your vision jumps into a familiar warm home. You see Syldor nervously sitting with his daughter on his knee, and they're talking. Syldor is back in Syngorn. Syldor isn't a fighter, Syldor is a diplomat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that's fair.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right, right.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Did you see them? Where are they?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Happy and healthy and comfortable by a fire.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: The whole army is happy and healthy and comfortable by a fire?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, he's not with the army is what I mean. Oh shit. I thought he was going to be with the army.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's okay we have plan B. Let's go deal with plan B.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'll scry again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or we can make Allura do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Allura, do you know where they are?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She can take us to Daxio?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know specifically where they are." And she sits for a second and sets up a rush job of a scry ritual, 'cause now she feels she's been put on the spot. But she puts it together.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I help her a little bit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you give her a little aid. You pay it back to the last time you helped her with a scry spell, back when you first met in Emon. And her eyes blink over white again, cloudy. And she returns. "All right, I see Mikael and the army gathered, and there is a very energetic air to "them. They're looking restless. I can bring eight of you with me."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, are there any trees near them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There are, yeah."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The problem is it generally has to be a tree that I'm familiar with.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you go with her, you'll be familiar with the tree.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It doesn't work that way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Question, if you go and you open up a path to the Sun Tree, can people on this side run through the Sun Tree?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I? That's an excellent question, can I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wait, so if you Transport via Plants--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like if I go with Allura and then open a gate through the Sun Tree, and they're just ready to rock.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you have a Sling Ring?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, damn it. Fucking lost my Sling Ring.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey! I'll do that. Does anyone else want to go, just in case?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, the eight of us need to go. And then how many is that left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That would leave--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Four?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then Grog, Pike and Gilmore. And Kima. And Jarett. Yeah, we could bring everybody."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Drake?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Is Drake coming?" And she looks off to the side, and you see this little figure running down from the castle at the top, carrying all this shit in his arms. "Hold on! I'm--" And you watch him just eat shit. He just tumbles; scatters. Gets up and is like, "No one saw that!" Picks it back up, runs back down and catches up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we supposed to get something from the-- Oh god, we were supposed to-- Weren't we supposed to grab something earlier? My brain is just turning to mush.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We got it already.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, we got it already; never mind, that's right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah. He gave it to us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where's Raishan, though?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Are we going to talk to what's-her-butt?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She'll find us. She's not our problem. She's not our problem. We're not babysitting a dragon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In fact, if anything, the less we speak to her at this point, probably the better.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: And you're sure she's coming?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Buddy! Where have you been!? I've been fucking worried sick! You were there; you were gone. How'd you even get back here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vax, please, don't--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Listen, I'm fucking with you. All right? What's up, green bean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So, are we ready for this?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Didn't think so. Let's do it."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So you all go; I'll stay with these ragtag group and sit by the tree and get ready.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But in that instant as you enter, he's in the process of having a conversation, and they have a layout of what looks to be a brief sketch of Emon in its current state, with a few things here and there marking where most of the gathered elements of the army, whatever you'd call it, the defense of Emon, exists. And as you all begin to enter the tent, he goes, "Oh, hello. I know of you, and I've "been expecting you. Allura has been kind enough to fill me in, in bits and pieces, but as far as I am "to understand, you're our strike force?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The elite SWAT team, heading in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good to know this. We've been walking for quite some time, and the soldiers have had a bit "of rest. If we could, we would take an additional day, just to put it at our most capable, but it "seems time is not at our beck and call in this situation, and as such, when the sun is down, I "think that is the agreed-upon time to strike."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: At sundown. All right, sure. Yeah, yeah, sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Most of these soldiers have, at least, night vision, some form of darkvision, I assume.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Most of the Syngorian army does, and we have quite a few at Daxio that do as well."

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: (flatly) How are you going to attack?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is Kashaw.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Hi. How are you going to attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Pleasure to meet you as well. So. We have broken up the regiments into five different "segments. We're going to separate, leading into the initial strike. We're going to simultaneously "hit the four main gates, the north, south, east, and west side. The easternmost gate has already "received quite a bit of damage. With all the simultaneous strikes, we're hoping to draw most of "the army to the outer circles of the city. We're going to utilize this time to then shift our "forces southward and instead push towards a singular gate in a southward position, while "they're scattered in that direction. If I'm to understand what Allura has told me, you are going "to be entering from underneath the city?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is the plan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And attempting to facilitate the opening of one or more of these gates in doing so?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That would be swell if we can, huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That would be."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We haven't really discussed it, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, no, but we have talked about doing it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or even breaching the south gate alone would be-- If all four gates are being--

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Any time we go out and we attack a gate, they're going to bring all of their forces to that gate. What they're not going to be suspecting is a wall being ripped down. And once you open a wall, you can't close it. You can close a gate.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's the weakest wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That would be the eastern wall."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's also near Greyskull Keep.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Oh, that's the arrow that you're going to use, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are not a very well-organized army, and most "of the creatures we've seen wandering the skies do so with nothing but bloodlust and the intent to "rend and tear as their main driving force and goal. So, utilizing that technique-- And we've "discussed, you'll be entering the walls; we'll be pushing forward, phalanx method with those that "are shielded. We will be piercing through and scattering from the inside, breaking their ranks "as much as possible, and doing our best to stay out of the skies, using alleyways, using small "streets. We don't want our men being plucked out from the middle, from their air support."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We will have air support.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I called in assistance from the Air Ashari, from the north. They're maintaining the skies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Ashari are aiding us as well?"

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Do you know how many?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did dad tell me how many?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He said roughly a hundred.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, shit. Thanks, dad. Roughly a hundred.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: If I can make a suggestion? If you get into the city, don't move through the alleys. You're going to scatter your forces. Move into the city and fortify a position. So then you've opened a gate inside the city. Move the command center inside the city, and defend from there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is indeed part of our push, however, we are rather vulnerable from the air. So with the "Air Ashari giving us air support, that will allow us the ability that we need to push forward as a "singular unit, from unit to unit, in its own right. You are entering from where?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The sewers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. We have a secret entrance in our keep, if we can still access it. If not, there is an entrance to the sewers towards the water. We were told of it by the Clasp, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've also used a tunnel to get out, at some point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's right, when you were looking for Kaylie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was Westruun.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's the same sewer system, though, right?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: It's the same basic layout of a city, yeah, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, wait, the Traverse Junction. What's the Traverse Junction?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Traverse Junction is-- was-- is, as far as I know, still attached to the Lyceum, but--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Lyceum's unguarded!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Lyceum is partially destroyed, and is filled with the remains of the enemy."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I remember that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's not what I meant, then. That wasn't the thing that I meant to say.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we know Thordak has made an underground basin. He only emerges when someone challenges him, or offers their loyalty.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Were we supposed to meet the Clasp in a specific place?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've just got to get to a sewer.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: So we just need to find a sewer and then we're going to reconnoiter with-- Is that the right word? Anyway-- with the Clasp. And at that point, we shall make our way through--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: And that's when the thieves and liars will take us to the thing that's going to kill us all? We're very excited about the plan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can tell."

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Yeah. Do we have the 50 soldiers we need, or do we need to ask them for 50?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did they ever show up? Did the 50 soldiers from Fort Daxio show up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I had heard that Daxio had fallen. There are survivors?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well. There were. There were about 55 soldiers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They haven't found their way to us yet, then. We'll keep an eye out."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They might be headed towards Greyskull, if I recall. I believe they were heading there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's true. They should be crossing paths very shortly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 50 men can move quietly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So after you cut through all of the lizardmen like butter, you'll make your way to Thordak?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's the intent, to push in towards the Cloudtop. And, based on how well you and/or any of "the air forces have been able to puncture the defenses, push in towards the creature itself and "unleash everything we have at the beast. As far as I know and have been told, from some of the "remaining members of the Council, they have a few members still within the city. I believe Tofor "Brotoras, Seeker Asum, and Brom Goldhand are still within the city."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, not Asum. We know where he is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Brom.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I thought Brom was at Whitestone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't say that word out loud.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I said it to you, quietly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, very quietly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll gather what we can. We don't really know what's actually in there, yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we can't trust anyone within the city limits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Understood."

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Do you have a time frame? For your attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We are intending, once the men have been fed, once the men have been able to rest and "prepare their armaments, we were going to attack upon sundown, yes."

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: And you plan to breach the city when?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hopefully within the first hour of the attack."

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's the intent."

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: How far do you think we can make it in the tunnels in an hour?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pretty far, to be honest, especially if we're-- Well, no that's--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 20 blocks.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: You making that number up?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: You just pulled that out of nowhere.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Absolutely.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the highest number he knows. Grog's not here; I have to do something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: An hour-- We can probably make it, I don't know, we can make it deep into the city, but not all the way to the center, can we?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, not in an hour.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a maze in there. But the tunnel from our keep in, if it's intact, was not that far.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you were to traverse the tunnel system in advance of our attack, that would perhaps aid "us in syncing our maneuvers."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we should go now.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: That would be the goal, is to act as point for the entire army.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That would indeed be the goal."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, what, the minute we pop out, we send up a flare?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We've taken much care to not be seen this far."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or we could just wait for sundown and then go, knowing that they're going to strike at the same time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We go now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I mean, once we get in there, we wait until we pop out, until it's getting dark outside.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, what kind of symbol do we send up in a sky full of wyverns?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if we're not in position by sundown?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Ashari are already looking for a symbol. I plan to be aiding them. They should be helping us with--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about a storm?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, there will be a storm.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Wait, there's a storm coming?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys actually glance over, you can see in the eastern sky, past the Iron Seat Ridge, there is an extremely dark, building stormfront that is just looming, miles off in the distance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: See? Told you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about-- Kiki, what if you just made some lightning strikes to signal the start of the fight?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think nature itself is going to make some lightning strikes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've got my whole Skywrite thing; I can make a symbol in the air out of clouds, which isn't as terrifying as everyone has thought it is in the past. We just need to pick a symbol--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It just has to be subtle, something your dad will recognize, huh?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: A phoenix or something.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: How is the storm going to affect your attack, is my question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We are trained to undergo warfare in many different forms of terrain and weather."

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: My concern is that if we wait until this storm comes in, the sewers will be flooded. We need to go in now before the storm gets here.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: But if we get lost in there and the storm comes, it'll be flooded while we're in there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The storm isn't a real storm, isn't it Air Ashari?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, no, it's Air Ashari.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But it's still a real storm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If there is rain to come with the storm, that is fortuitous, for much of the city still "burns. But fire we can quell with a storm would be helpful."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a-coming man. It's coming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right, good to know this."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, let's go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To Greyskull Keep?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look for-- Keep your eye on the sky.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I will have two of my hawkeyes keeping an eye at the clouds"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: When you see it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I look forward to solving your riddle. You as well, stay safe."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't know what the fuck it's going to be. It could be a big "VM" for Vox Machina, I mean like you know-- We could be like, Now! Fucking attack!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are there clouds overhead now? Above the city.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you look up, it's-- the weather over here's been fairly clear. There are a few wispy white clouds, but nothing that is indicative of a storm, yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If the storm has taken the city, there will be a break in the storm, of a perfect circle, where we are attacking--

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: The eye of a hurricane.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The eye of a hurricane. If it is not a force, we can certainly look for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And if the skies are clear, they'll not be clear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It will be a nice column that will--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Then--"

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Look for the stillness in the storm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We shall. Travel safe, travel swift."

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Safe journey.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You as well, good luck."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Be pleased. Remember, the plan is chaos.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Total chaos.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Chaos can work.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Chaos works very well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We make our way to Greyskull.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Back to Greyskull.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you guys make your way towards Greyskull Keep. Walking through, as you see rows and rows of soldiers of different walks of life, all part of the alliance of Tal'Dorei between Syngorn and Emon. Many of them watch as you pass, some just curious as to what regiment you belong to, and you get a couple of occasional looks of recognition.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wink.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Dale? Where you been, man?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Wait! Kash?"

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: What the hell's going on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Going to die today, what are you doing?"

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Pretty much the same thing man, how's Anne?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anne's not doing too well."

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Aw, I'm sorry to hear that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, she was in the city when the dragons attacked."

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: No! She wasn't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Oh, that's horrible!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's okay, we're going to kill them today, right?"

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: We're getting there buddy. Good to see you, you're looking good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good to see you too, you too!"

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: All right, I'll see you later, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: That was-- I haven't seen that guy in forever. So bizarre. Sorry, let's go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Small world man, small world.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And we're walking and we're walking and we're walking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like I've had that awkward four minutes of like every con ever. Oh god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys exit the side ranks of the current encampment, as they are all preparing, the sun itself growing maybe about two hours out from touching the horizon, you can see, in the distance, on some of the outer embankment and small structures that litter the walls of Emon's surrounding fields, you see Greyskull Keep, a very welcoming, longtime coming return. As you stay low to the grass, I need you all to make stealth checks

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then you--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural 20 right here as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Really? Eh! Natural 20 bros!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 19, I haven't added yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck you.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Ten!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I cast Pass Without a Trace on all of us? Is it too late? Can I just add it to everybody's if I cast it now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys were going stealthy, I'll say sure. Because you would have known, at this point to do so. If you want to spend your spell slot to do that, sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And that's plus ten, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it adds ten to all of your rolls.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 35, now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 35, 35 with the plus ten. 35.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you guys all stay low and guarding each other, keeping an eye out to make sure nobody is giving too much away. You manage to go unnoticed--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (coughing) Sorry, I so inhaled my spit, keep going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't do that. That's bad.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Make a breathing saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go on, guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rolled double ones. (wheezing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys make your way to Greyskull Keep, front door's open. Like, partially ajar. Not locked.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I move in, forward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you head inside first.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to poke my head in first.

lines.name: MATT
