lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take a moment and look around, listen carefully. No sound.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So far so good. I'm going to move further in. And continue to-- I'm going to check for traps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fine, sure, investigation is an 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Nothing appears to be trapped here. If anything is out of place, you know this area pretty well, so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're making our way to the doorway, we peek in now.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Is it very dark in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are no current set torches or candlelight whatsoever, there are a few openings that bring some light in. Specifically from Sarenrae's temple. But other than that, it is pretty dark in the hallways.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Can I see anything with darkvision?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: People have been rummaging through, there is no sign of any food whatsoever in the keep anymore, there are a number of bowls and anything of any remote value has either been taken or is left used and unwashed. But after doing a quick scan, there is no one inside Greyskull Keep. Apparently--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like, the whole place?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So all the way up the stairs, to our bedrooms, to his laboratory, all that's clear?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of it's empty, but a lot of things have been taken.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I go in the kitchen and just sort of sense magic, or do an arcana check or something, to see if there's any--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a Detect Magic spell, if you have that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't have that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then you would be hard-pressed to detect if it's present necessarily.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is your poop still around?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My poop is still there, it's just inert. It's

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did somebody steal the poop?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, is it still there in the jar that I left it in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, there is a broken jar on the ground. It looks like somebody discovered it and wasn't quite sure what it was, and then discovered what it was.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: This isn't pudding! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This single scoop tastes funny.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Gelato? (retches)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The behavioral patterns of the way things are left, it looks like people have come in through, rummaged, grabbed what they needed to survive, or what seemed of value, and left. And things they didn't understand, or didn't see value in, they left behind. Most of your workshop has been ransacked.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I figured.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your cask is still there. And a few esoteric tools that they didn't really understand, or too big to maneuver, are still there. But most of your toolset is gone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grabbing what's useful, and maybe as a lark I might try and run a wire from my inert glove to Cabal's Ruin to see if I can actually get the charge to travel through it if I punch something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to use one of the charges, you can try that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll find out in the moment, won't I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that you will.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Try it on the day.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Is this your castle?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, this is our house. This is our keep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a keep, not a castle.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: This is lovely. It's a little cold.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But it's seen better days.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: But the bones are good.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Lot of space.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a fixer-upper.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Good location.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going downstairs to the entrance, and I'm going to check it out. And use Divine Sense at the entrance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make an investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. That's good. That is a 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Divine Sense doesn't trigger anything off. Nothing gets you riled up in that sense.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Feathers are in place?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Indeed, yes. Except the two that were cut earlier from Kashaw. But you do find the hidden entrance, or the exit I guess you could say from the keep, left as it was, untouched. The seam still smooth, covered in dust.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nothing hinky with it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing hinky, no traps.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go down to the secret path. We're in a hurry now, we've got to get into the city.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I show Kashaw the cask, by the way. I have some powdered death, if you like. This will explode very loudly.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: How much damage?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know, I've honestly been too nervous to ever find out. Because everybody who plays with this loses a limb eventually.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Is it heavy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear this faint echoing voice in the back of your head that says, "Learn from my mistakes..." (laughter)

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I say we bring it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's my plan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I just give you a quick note? Planning Kashaw is very staccato. He's very clipped. I feel like when you're just talking normally, you're so warm and pleasant. But when you're planning, you get this voice you use that's very grating. I'm just saying, try to even out your tone. Do some breathing exercises, breathe from the diaphragm.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To the tunnels.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Grog happily takes the cask under his arm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't drink that, Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh come on! One--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, none of it. No-- (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay."

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: He could fart explosives if he did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt's Grog and Matt's Trinket are very similar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To be fair. You guys all-- single-file, because this tunnel is not very wide, it's maybe four feet wide-- you make your way through and it's a long, musty tunnel. It smells of damp earth and dust.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to pass out these healing potions before we get anywhere.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, why don't everybody bunch up for a second then?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Is there light in there? Do you need light, are there torches?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is no light.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I cast Light.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, we have three greater healings, five regular healings, and two superiors. Who needs what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take a greater.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Superior, please. I'm weak as fuck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, take one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd like to take a greater as well, because I'm always far away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Greater for me." Grog raises his hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You want a greater or--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, please."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, we have one greater left. Five regulars, so I'll pass out regulars to-- Do you need any? You, you--

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I should be okay with healing, but if you'd like I'll take one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm all right. I still have a couple.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I have one normal, and two greater, and one superior.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's one superior left. Oh, you already have a superior?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I have a superior, two greater, and one normal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit. You have a fuckton of potions!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take a superior and one of them fire resistance, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Take the superior, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I need the stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Zero superior and four fire potions. I'm taking one of the fire potions as well, so that's three fire potions left.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If I could have a fire potion?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, two fire potions left.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Should Pike have a fire potion?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike has fire resistance.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I don't know, I've only met her once.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would love a fire resistance potion, if one exists.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course darling, whatever you need.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: No, I have fire-resistant plate, but I'd love a healing potion, if you have an extra.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You want to take two regulars?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take the fire resistance. All right, one fire resistance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are awkwardly passing this down this singular tunnel, having to almost chain it back and forth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I load up Grog's camelback with healing potions.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Now, the potion of invulnerability. Is there someone specific we need to give that to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It sounds really neat."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't we give it to Grog for now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, Grog already halves all of his damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog, if we give it to you now, you can't drink it now. Not now. You have to wait.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Quick rule point, if he already takes a lot of half damage, if he takes the potion, it doesn't really affect?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it quarter the damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. He just likes being invulnerable.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It should go to Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I didn't wanna--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because you're gonna get close.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm gonna get up in his shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It doubles your HP, double your HP.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just wanted you to be able to pl-- excuse me? Can I have that, Grog?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I still have it. I didn't give it to him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I have that, please?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What do you want to give me?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't have it, Grog. You don't have the potion.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's holding a wood chip.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where did you find a purple wood chip down here? That's, oh--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Travis just texted me saying he does not have resistance to fire, which I knew. So if anyone would like to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! Okay, well then he gets the last--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The last one is Grog. He takes it and is about to open the cork.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no! Grog, wait for when we start fighting Thordak.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What can I drink?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Some ale.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Use your magic canister.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whispers) "Mayonnaise." (laughter)

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I would also like to evoke Fiendish Vigor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's that?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Which means I can cast False Life on myself for one hour, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you do it now?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Well, we're about to go in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's gonna take us an hour to get to the center of the city.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: All right, right before we go in, I'll hold it. Grog, give me a drink! Just one small one! Just a shot. Don't look at me like that, I just want a shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's like an urn-type cask, and he holds it over to you, and it's just filled with mayonnaise.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: No, all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sour, isn't it?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sweet, bitter, angry.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: It's good. It's only four or five days old.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hand the bottle to Kash.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm gonna give-- I don't know if Pike has any healing potions, so I'm gonna give her a regular healing potion just for something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're going out like we came in!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're in a little tunnel passing things up and down in a little single file.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eating mayonnaise out of a jar.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kash, pass the trail mix. Pass it all the way back.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I smell a new sponsor!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mayonnaise?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys eventually find your way towards the end of the tunnel that leads to the ladder that leads you into the alleyway on the outskirts of the southern edge of Emon. You make your way up-- Well, it leads you through an outhouse, an alley. You've been here before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm gonna, yes, I'm gonna peek through the pooper first. Let's see what I see.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Okay, that's fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We know where the entrance to the tunnels are, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm just looking for anything unexpected, 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is empty and still chained.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are there poos?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It is chained shut for that reason.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's clear.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should I-- Before we go out there, should I Seeming us as lizard people? Yes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you do it to all of us?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can do eight. Wait, is that right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we? What time is it? What time of day is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's maybe like, at this time? After travelling this far in Emon, you're maybe 40 minutes from sunset.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Want to be lizard people or no?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Has the storm hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The storm is getting closer.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that we will not act like lizard people, and also anybody who can see through, there are like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lizard people can't see through that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They are idiots. But they also--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All we need is a second to get some confusion.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're used to seeing humans, though, and as long as we scatter and are fearful they'll--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't mind being invisible. That's not an issue. Meaning I can make a number of us invisible "if you want to go--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many can you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not all of you, obviously! But like, if some of you wanna go as lizardfolk or somebody "else can--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to be invisible!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Invisible, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've got a ring that makes you invisible!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm busy with other things. Also, it's maybe time for another Feast? Isn't it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're still good, I think.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's about sundown. When we did it last-- We did it before beddie-bye.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But that takes an hour, we're not gonna sit here in the sewer eating a fucking--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We cannot fucking fight Thordak without a Heroes' Feast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How long has it been? Is it almost up?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: 40 minutes until battle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, I mean, you guys-- It's about 40 minutes until sundown.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't have time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we eat a really fast feast?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: McFeast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: When did we eat the feast last night? About this time? Are we about to expire or can we push it? Was it a midnight snack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys would choose the most optimal time, since there was no rush to eat the feast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes! We would have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would have been like, well shit, let's do it at 6:00 because we're fighting-- That's probably when you guys would've. So you probably have until the end of the evening.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Three or four hours-ish.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There would have been no benefit to doing it earlier.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: These things move quickly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Am I turning us into lizard people?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Some of us, but I'm invisible because of Gilmore.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we making an above-ground jump to the underground tunnels again?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Someone knows where they're going, right?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Where's the Clasp? Are we going to meet up with them at some point?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Once we're down there, they'll know we're here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How far is the tunnel jump? How long do we have to be above ground? I'm asking because I might be able to make some holes in the wall to cut us into other tunnels and not have to go above ground at all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When you recall Garthok leading you through Emon to get to the Clasp entrance, you had to be above ground for probably about 20 minutes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 20 minutes?!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: That's a lifetime above ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A lot of it was spent slow because you guys were stealthy, jumping from alley to alley and being very stealthy. If it was a brisk pace, it could be as fast as ten.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was to the entrance to the Clasp, not the entrance to the sewer system, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could just pop down to a sewer. Do we see a sewer hole?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to go inspect, you could look for one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then we have to find our way through the sewer that we don't really know how to get through. We should find the Clasp entrance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This plan is smart. Wait, once we get to the Clasp, then we have to fucking talk to the Clasp.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, for a second.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: They're going to help us, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kash, don't talk when we're in there.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I won't speak. Remember that time I saved your life?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was wonderful, and I'm very grateful.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: No, we're good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm very glad you're here, though.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Thank you, that's very sweet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, are we lizarding and then invis-ing?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, and then we're going to go quickly to the Clasp entrance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll make us all lizard people, even the ones turning invisible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! I don't want to be a lizard person.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Invisible lizard people!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need someone who can turn invisible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Except for myself. Myself, I'll put the Hat of Disguise on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you're attuning to that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's an attuned?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Only if it says it. Does it say it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I have it? I gave it to you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I gave it back. That was a long time ago. Years.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fine, I'll make myself a lizard person, too.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: An invisible lizard person.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A little lizard person.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Sam, I can do me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't waste a spell.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'm not. It's an invocation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seeming affects how many people?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As many as are near me when I cast it. Any number of creatures, it says.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is awesome! Seeming is broken!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seeming is broken.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How appropriate that we're going to be underground lizard people in the city of Los Angeles.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's very appropriate.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is our best urban myth. The lizard people of Los Angeles.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: That's not a myth. I have a friend who knows somebody who saw one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's true!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm pretty big.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You now have a cluster. As Gilmore begins his incantation for the Invisibility spell for him, Vax, and Vex, you guys all watch as each of your forms become these emaciated lizardfolk, except for Scanlan, who is this much shorter, but Wolverine-stocky-looking lizardman.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a glandular problem.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: It's the mayonnaise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chanting) "You're ridiculous." (chanting) He finishes the incantation, and Gilmore, Vex, and Vax vanish.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can't see us, motherfucker!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I suppose the invisible people will lead the way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Who knows where they're going?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We do; we all followed Garthok.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Okay. Can we see the invisible people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Then how the fuck are we going to follow you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We also know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys begin to make your way through, out of the alley--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I tug on Kash's little braid behind him.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Aw, come on! I hate that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys make your way into the street, out of the alleyway. It doesn't take you long to find an entrance to the sewer. You do occasionally hear the distant, ominous (wing flapping) of a wyvern rider or two doing a pass over this portion of the city. A lot of the buildings on the outskirts have been damaged even further from last time you were here. A number of the buildings have doors torn off the hinges, signs of struggle on the outside. It takes you only a couple of minutes before you find a grate, a drainage runoff for rain in the city that leads into a subterranean sewer system. It is a little bit out in the open. It's between two buildings, but right on the cusp of the street itself, so you'll have to be quick about it.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Who's opening it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Invisible person opens it and then somebody invisible keeps watch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm keeping watch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That grate is

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's brand new.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No one's ever trapped it, yeah, man. You could sell that. Like it was day one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I lick it. There's nothing; it tastes clean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it tastes sweet, actually!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. Is it locked?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not locked. It's wedged a little bit in there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog, help! Lift!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Quietly!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stealthily.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay! Shh!" He walks over and reaches. As you're down there, he walks over, not seeing you, reaches on each side of you to get to the grate. Are you going to try to get out of the way?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'll roll out of there. It seemed like you had a little story you wanted to tell. Yeah, I roll out of there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see there is a somewhat eroded ladder, set of rungs, but it is functional.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far down, with darkvision?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About 20 feet. It seems to open into a chamber or sewer system.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I spank him on the ass and say: I'm going in, follow me. I drop in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, Grog! Put the grate down very quietly! I whisper in his ear.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On tiptoes. Standing on his knee.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all head down there with Pike in tow, Gilmore following, invisible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Once we're down in there, I bamf Trinket out of the necklace.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I use Beast Speech. How are you, Trinket? It's been a long time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes. I'm scared."

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Don't worry. You know Vex loves you very much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's why I'm here."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love you very much.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Thank you for coming and helping us. Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And for being such a badass!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (grunts) "Smells weird."

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Kiss him on his--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's cold. It's damp.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I love him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys continue up the sewer system. It's been a dry spell for a month, at least. It hasn't rained in the past couple of weeks. It rains fairly often here, so the system itself doesn't have a lot of drainage going through. That'll change soon, I'm sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm 40 feet ahead the whole time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. About ten more minutes into travel, you're starting to get fairly close to game time, when things begin. You do hear some whispers up ahead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hold on. Vex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It sounds like four different voices are all conversing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I creep up next to him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In one location?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A little ways ahead, out of sight. You're not sure of the source; it's echoing from ahead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Listen with me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are they saying?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man! Oh good, that was good!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: There was a second where you thought it wasn't going to be good!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's my piece of paper? Perception. That is a 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex, as you hone in your ranger attentiveness, you've studied lip-movement, you've read lips so much to the point where any dis-enunciation, you can fill in the gaps. The conversation sounds like, bits are talking about the relocation of people, timing, "it's too dangerous," "we have to "move further west," "the tunnels are down," "now now now," and you hear a bunch of footfalls.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Running away from us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Running in a direction, you can't make out if it's towards or away, right now in this moment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we pop out now and talk to them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You now see what looks to be seven figures step into the center of the walkway where you are, walking away from you, in the direction you were traveling.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Is anybody still invisible and/or lizards?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are all still lizards and three of you are invisible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And they're heading towards us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're heading away from you, in the direction you were going.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait if I go?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They hate you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three of them stop and turn, "Wait, shh!" It's really quiet, they've all just stopped.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you true to Emon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stillness, no movement. One of them goes and pulls a blade out very quietly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I used to be one of you. I used to be Clasp.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That may be the funniest that's ever been.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Joke has been waiting for years.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, what's up, 2014!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Remastered!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You made it funny again!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's in the game.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you invisible?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we're still invisible.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're friends of Garthak.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Garthok?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Garthok.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're invisible, and you're far back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also, all the figures that were stopped are slowly crawling in your direction. And one of them goes, "It's lizardmen. Turn away."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not lizardmen. Magic.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a ruse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check, with disadvantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you're two voices coming out of the ether right now! They just see a cluster of lizards in the shadows and voices going, "No, we're okay!" (laughter)

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: "We're not lizards!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't worry, guys!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rolled a 20, and a one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shut up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You also rolled a one?! You both rolled fucking ones?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Cacaw, look over here!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one in the front goes, "Shit! We have to close it! Run, run!" And all seven just start running in the direction they were going.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, fuck, what do we do? Somebody--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I go running up! Wait!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Drop Seeming, drop Seeming! Drop Seeming, Scanlan!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm running after them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, okay! I'm dropping Seeming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Please, wait! We're not lizardmen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're still invisible.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: We're not lizardmen!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Please, wait! Please, do not be afraid. We are with you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, sorry, you're freaky-looking, so-- (laughter)

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I understand that! I'm not a lizard person, and I have a very high persuasion!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They have bolted very quickly, and they are not showing any sign of slowing, and you just hear the footprints go (stepping sounds).

lines.name: LAURA, MARY
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Move fast.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: We can't catch them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you're keeping in pace. So, if you guys full bore, double dashing--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: How far away are they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're beyond your visual sight right now in the darkness.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Are they more than 30 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, they are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I shout out after them, I know Garthok, he'll recognize me!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He also kind of hates us, I think.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't care.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The, mm... Double one, man.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. No, they're still running. They're still running.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're still running after them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys follow them for the next ten minutes or so, and you're roughly ten minutes from sundown, game time, before you hear a door slam ahead of you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to move to that door.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I immediately stop and start looking behind me. Does this look like we just ran into a trap?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check. Well, this would be more of an investigation.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are they catching up behind?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. 21 total.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm checking the door, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Looking around, it's hard to see. The sewer has slowly given way to a non-sewage tunnel system that looks like it has existed for a long time. This is reminiscent of some elements of the Clasp's tunnel system that you've seen before, though you haven't really been to it this far south in the city.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I stand back before I run in with the rest of them. I don't want to get us all in a corridor.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Can we investigate the door?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rolled a 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's currently doing that right now. You rolled a 20?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like that you're talking to Matt through the earring.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't touch me! 28! Support you left and right, and this is the thanks I get?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door is locked, and the door is trapped.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan. Will you come up here, please? I've got my hand on my earlobe for a fucking reason.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm here, what do you need?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I need you to talk us into this fucking doorway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For what, are we still trying to get this Clasp? Ten minutes has gone by. All right, great.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Talk to the fuckers on the other side of this door. You can talk to anybody.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I knock, knock, knock on the door. And I say, oi, I know you can hear me in there. Sorry for the scare. We're friends, and we're here to help you get a lot of gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check with disadvantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because it's through a door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And because they--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because we're assholes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You should try and sell them drugs. I think that would go well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, sell them drugs!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I can guarantee you, they don't have any.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, he's got them, he can sell them off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're the Clasp.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're straight-edge, I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, totally.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: You still don't know if you put it up your ass or smoke it. How are you gonna sell it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll find out from them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a pause, and then a voice comes through and says, "So. Who are you? What do you "want? What leaves you the possibility of wandering these sewers unstabbed?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: First of all, you, or members of your organization, know us. We are from Emon. We are Emonites. Emonies? We're locals. We've traveled these sewers before, among you. And we will again tonight if you help us find our way to Thordak. We are super-powerful superheroes who are gonna kill a dragon and give you half the gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Half the gold?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then you hear (door opening sound) and the door just ever faintly opens, and just a single face pokes through, hood up. "So. You're allies against the dragon?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Absolutely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How many are you?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: About a half dozen, let's say.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Twice a half a dozen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think 12-ish?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten, ten? Some are animals, some are invisible. Six to 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "One false move, you'll all have a bolt in the back of the skull. Walk with us, we'll see if what you "say is true."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I use Thieves' Cant to knock out the phrase, "No bullshit," on the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see his chin move and grind for a moment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: He thinks you're cute.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like that he goes-- and it's a 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. (laughs) You see him go-- and slowly back away. The door opens wider, and as you enter the room, you can see there's roughly 30 people in various dark bits of dress. The Clasp had a uniform, or at least a uniform style to them, when they were within their safe space. While that still exists, all of them look tattered. They look underfed. They look sleepless. And they all look driven. And it's that cornered animal look that both is welcoming and also a little scary. And as you all walk in, they all very intently keep their eyes on you, their crossbows at their side. They're all surveying you and taking in and-- You can definitely see them accepting that you are powerful in comparison to maybe many of the others that they've encountered. And that also scares them. It would be like, 'Good. Fuck,' at the same time. And as you all walk in, in this sullen atmosphere, the one that was talking to you pulls his hood back, and you see it's a younger man, probably in his late 20s, but his face is just currently wrecked by some sort of a disease that's just scarred over.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where is Shenn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You want us to take you to Shenn?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no time, to be honest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where is he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Something's going to be happening tonight, and the "Clasp is getting ready."

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Yeah, we've got about ten minutes until all hell breaks loose. So if we've got to do this, we've got to do this now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've got to get to where Thordak is.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Is he by this volcanic surge?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That he is. (sighs) Travel fast. Travel light. Follow me." Puts his hood back up, and goes into a run.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Go running.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Naruto.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all gave chase, at this point, as fast as you can. Poor Pike is like (panting).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog picks her up, come on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you hear in the distance the sound of cracking thunder.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: (whispers) The storm's coming.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As soon as we get out, Keyleth, you have to make a storm or something--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or a VM or something, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She can probably do it through the grates.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Hurricane.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear another bolt of lightning and thunder in the distance. And another (lightning crack). The storm is getting faster and more successive and it's definitely landed in Emon. You continue to push forward--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: How far are we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You shouting ahead of--?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: How much longer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You feel that?"

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No. Do you feel

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As I'm running, I'm dipping arrows in poison.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So go ahead and mark those--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Six vials of poison. So that makes six arrows or does that make--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Each vial can make three poisoned arrows.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Three? However many I can make during this amount of time. Because I know it only lasts for an hour. So on the tips.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So per vial is three hours.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Awesome!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a little hard.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's one of those things I meant to do earlier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is the closest I can get you but I don't know how you want to climb. Good luck." And he turns around and darts back where you guys came from.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: So he's guiding us up and out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he's gone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've got to get up. So wait, there's a pipe to climb up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a three-, four-foot-wide tunnel. It used to go straight up, but now parts of it are (ground cracks). It's a little crooked and some of the initial climbing rungs have eroded away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we parkour up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Certainly. Go ahead and make acrobatics checks, both of you guys.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Can Grog throw us up?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there a grate ahead of us? Can I see the sky?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is, but it doesn't-- it looks partially off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you guys, in a networked-twin-type near-ballet in its execution, darting up in tandem, both using each other to push off as you hit each edge, you make your way to the very top in this crisscross fashion, then one of you gets up just in time to hit the grate as the other one hits the other side, sending it onto the ground outside.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Perception check. For anything nearby.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: By the way, I was totally going to say I was putting Trinket back in the necklace before you started saying all that, I was just-- It went into it right away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Not a worry. Trinket is in the necklace.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I want to perception check too. Just because, you know, that 29 isn't going to see everything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, you've got to get 30, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. No, this is a 23. So-- (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys both look out. You, Vex, looking around you, you can see you are in the street. And you can see there are a number of buildings around: single-story, second-story, some of them long-collapsed and burned. Some still have flames on them that the rain is attempting to put out, but the fire is fighting back. You, Vax, see the same spread, and off to the left of you, a familiar sight. The Cloudtop District wall and gates, maybe a couple hundred feet off from your current position. You can see beyond that just a singular, black column of smoke, with the occasional flicker of red embers just drifting up through, fighting against the storm itself. The rain may fall, but it doesn't seem to last long enough to hit the ground of the Cloudtop. You see mist and steam begin to rise up; the rain is evaporating before it can even get close. You also see above the gate what looks to be a few dozen small, dark shapes. You take a moment to focus before you can see what looks to be-- what were once people are now blackened husks that have been left up on chains; decoration, if you will, for the outside of the Cloudtop. It's a warning, or a celebration of Thordak's rule. You see, on the outside of that gate, two large, armored, alert fire giants, wielding long, thick, square, black metal blades that themselves have flames engulfing. And they are both standing there, just shoulder to shoulder, looking about, on high alert based on the current chaos of the circumstance.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's between us and them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's road. It's just bare road. You have buildings to each side, you're just now emerging from the alleyway, and you are in the center of the street right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far are they from us right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're a little over a hundred feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two fire giants?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull Vex out of view--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, we're invisible.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know, I don't want to be heard. We've got two fucking giants up here, guarding our path--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: About a hundred feet off, clear view.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's no more tunnel down here, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it goes for another five or six feet, and then it is just wrecked, it's collapsed, ruined--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We cannot spend our energy fighting these guys. We have to distract them away and move in past their position.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can conjure an elemental. Will it--?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And one of them will chase it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it possible to get up and over the wall, away from them?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How do we get by?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a gate behind the line?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Can we hear this conversation?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can hear half of it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two fire giants guarding the gates. We have to get rid of them.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Can we get into a building on the other side?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's just a wall, it's defensive. We can get over the wall, perhaps.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What kind of wall is it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 30 feet high?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is about roughly 30, 35 feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I peek my head out--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh! It is a solid, thick, stone wall. It is designed as a second-tier defense from siege warfare against the palace and the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I use Stoneshape to stoneshape us a hole through it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know that it's pretty thick. You're familiar with the wall. You guys have traveled to and from the Cloudtop before. Let me see, where's Stoneshape--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Extend the tunnel?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or I can fly up to the top of the wall and drop the rope down?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The problem is, I don't know how far the tunnel has collapsed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No more than five feet in any dimension. No, it's thicker than that.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Where do you need to go beyond this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I took-- Okay, here's the thing: I took Move Earth. I can try and tunnel us through. But that's a pretty big spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, what if--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Move Earth also takes a while.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if I come out, I fly, I move down away from the fire giants, I fly up to the top of the wall and drop the rope down? So everybody can climb up?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But nobody's invisible but ourselves.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: It's too much of a chance, they're going to see you.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: They're going to see you. How far away are we from them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're about a hundred feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can make another three of us invisible. But that's still not enough.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do fire giants have any reason to attack lizard people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe make lizard people and then pop over--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've just burned a 5th-level spell making us lizard people once for no fucking reason.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And that's dropped at this point?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: You need a distraction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We definitely do.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Let us do this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You two?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Two of us have to stay.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Let us do this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Let. Us. Do. This.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: We don't have any time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We need you guys. We need-- we need you.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: You can do this without us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you going to go out and draw them away?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: We'll try and meet you if we can. In the meantime, call your people. Do it now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Absolutely.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I cast-- I invoke-- I use a cantrip Mask of Many Faces. As a lizard person, I go ten feet so I'm within 90 feet, and I cast Evard's Black Tentacles on the two fire giants.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've got to go out the tunnel first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I grab Kash by the arm really fast, and I just say, thank you. And I give him a kiss on the cheek.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: We're way past that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just shut up and appreciate it! Go!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Before I go running out, I grab Vex. I love you, if I can find you, I will. If not, stay alive.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I grab Vax real quick. Hey!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Two things.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's that?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: First: it's one-one. And second: don't get us all dead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, cutie.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Good luck in battle.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: So I go running out. Lizard face. Once I get out of the tunnel, Mask of Many Faces, lizard. I just go walking up. Within 90 feet, I cast Evard's Black Tentacles, hoping to hold them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As she's doing this, anyone else doing anything else? Are you--?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I put on Gloves of Climbing to climb up the thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Spiderwalk.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Kash just stands with his back to them, guarding them as they're going up the wall, spear at the ready.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you brooming it? I'm holding onto the broom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys go up there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I drop the rope down so Grog and Pike and everybody else can go up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Easy enough. You all eventually get your way up to the top and duck in an alley. I need you to roll stealth checks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We still have that--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pass Without a Trace that I cast? Yeah--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an hour concentration.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I cast it again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, I mean it's still on. It's an hour concentration. It'll last until--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well actually, you cast it right before you guys got to the keep, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right, at the keep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, no-- Yeah, so you do not have it currently. I'm sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we get advantage because we're invisible?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The invisible folks do, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah okay, good.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: (chuckles) Invisible folks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. And-- okay. You guys manage to dart up-- you notice-- First off, the wyverns are now coasting by and scooting over the sky, in groups of ten at a time. And you can see now as the bolts of energy are starting to hit-- Off in the distance, you see a flash and (lighting strikes) as one gets taken down by a bolt of lightning. The wind is now picking up and beginning to swirl. You watch as they're having a hard time flying and being harried by the elements, just darting around and slamming into them. One of the fire giants sees movement over in your direction (speaks in Giant), and starts walking that way as you begin to emerge in your lizard-person form.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I quietly inspire Kash?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can if you like.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) Kash! King of the Universe! Kash! Ah-ah! He is the best of us!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: (singing) And his hair was parted in the middle-- (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Take your d12 inspiration die.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Where's my d12?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: You just hold on to it.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as you walk forward and lift your hands up, clutching the staff, you watch as these black ethereal tentacles burst out of the ground, slam into the ground, and attempt to wrap around the legs and lower body of these giants. What is your spell DC?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's been a while since she's played, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Yeah, so they're both restrained and they take 3d6 bludgeoning damage, if you want to go ahead and roll that.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: 3d6? They're restrained! And it's 3d6 bludgeoning damage, which is ten.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Both of them? You just restrained two fire giants?! Holy shit!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ten is on the good side of 3d6--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as it pulls them back, their swords are held at bay, their wrists are bound by these tentacles, and both of them are being crushed by it. And the other one-- No one here speaks Giant, except for Grog.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I speak Giant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You and Grog hear it, and it just says, "Under attack!" in Giant. And as they're both being held there, as you're holding them in place, they take the damage. What are the rest of you guys doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I immediately, right above us, create a little eye-of-the-hurricane. And you know when it snows and there's a moonbow? A rainbow? I do a little bit of a moonbow situation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, are we trying to keep stealthed and then letting Zarah and Kash--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we just go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to pass them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then we run!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys all bolt towards the-- there's a 15-foot gap between these two giants right now. And you're rushing across this, like a double-dash, you get just to them as it comes to their go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought we were up and over the wall.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no. We were out of the pipe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I understand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm rolling as bad as I did on--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Stay right where you are, boys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both try desperately, staring down at you and growling, you can see the strain as the tentacles are pulling on them, their swords burning--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Welcome to hentai! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --and you're keeping guard there, at the ready. What are you guys doing? You're at the door now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog! Can Grog punch through it? I don't--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, I can!" And he goes for a full swing against the door-- Yeah! Oh, man! Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (in Grog's voice) Surprise, gents!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 20 for Grog! (cheering)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would Evasion work for this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a dex save. All right, it's just 20 with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as the opening's there, you dart in as the giants are restrained. And you guys, what are you doing at this point? The giants aren't going to be held for long.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Kash?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Can I cast Geas on one and have one attack the other?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Swing away, Kash.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Am I allowed to take control of one of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, I will see what the-- casting time is one minute. So that's ten rounds that you have to cast that spell-- It's not much of a combat spell, really.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Because they're flame giants, right? Does a Flame Strike work on them? Or are they susceptible to flames, or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is up to what you might expect.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Then let's give it a try. We're going to try to do a 5th-level Flame Strike and see what happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty! Go ahead and roll 4d6 radiant damage. Both restrained, so they have disadvantage on the save. Yeah, no.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: I also still have my inspiration, too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It won't help here.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: It's awful, I-- It's 13. Yeah. 13

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You, who are still maintaining concentration on this spell, what do you want to do?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What is the radius of Witchbolt? If I drop Evard's and hit-- they're 15 feet apart from each other?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're 15 feet apart from each other, yes.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I just don't know what the radius of Witchbolt is. Can I hit both of them with it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With Witchbolt? With Witchbolt, as a--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You'd need a ten-foot radius to hit both of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's going to be a tough call. Let me see-- Witchbolt-- No, no. Witchbolt hits one creature.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Only hits one creature?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You can still maintain a concentration spell and do instant spells, if you wanted to.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes! So then I will hold Evard's Black Tentacles and use a cantrip of Eldritch Blast and Agonizing Blast? Can I do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's part of the ability. So, yeah, you can do that. Make three spell attack rolls.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three spells?! She's so powerful!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's all against one guy or it's--? How are you splitting it up?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'm going to hit two on the left, one on the right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your spell attack bonus is--?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Plus 12, so 15. Plus Agonizing Blast--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That only adds to damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the first one you fire at? It arcs past and hits the door behind, hitting the where the already damaged door fell off the hinges.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Go ahead and roll-- So you've hit one, now roll for hitting the other.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Oh, natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll your d10 plus seven. What's the first one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's 1d10 for the first roll, next one is the critical.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: That's a ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And roll one more time.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Plus my charisma?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. Add that in there. So go ahead and roll for your critical now.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Six. Plus my charisma, which is eleven, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Great! So you blast both of them and they're still held in place. You guys run past. They're both taking hits from Zahra, but they're both more focused on the people that are being led through the gate they were ordered to watch. And--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far are the twins from the giant?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys just ran through into the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right through?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We want to take sneak attacks on both of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And five and a seven, they cannot make their checks for shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: First one hits. And then 21, does that hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, do I get three attacks-- oh, no, no, no, I'm not clicking the boots yet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 21. So 21 hits?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 hits, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Augh, what's happening?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so the first one was-- All the dice, all the dice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, 15 for the first hit. 22 for the second.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 36 for my first, and eight for my second.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And just keep running.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And keep running, okay. All right, so you guys lob those attacks as you're rushing past, you guys see-- actually, both of you guys roll perception checks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12. You just make it-- you, Kashaw, out of the corner of your eye, you notice the buildings that were on fire, the flames that were burning amidst the storm, you watch as one of the flames leaps out of the house. And a number of other flames begin to rise up as living, flaming entities that are making their way towards you. And you can quickly see that this is about to become--

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But as you see Vox Machina running into the Cloudtop District and disappearing into the surrounding clouds and fume.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: May the gods be with you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Totally minor, I didn't add my regular bonus for dex and all that, so add another eight to my damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, got it.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: So they're leaving.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got them in.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Go! Go! We'll find you if we can! In the meantime, my love, shall we have some fun?

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Let's do this thing, baby!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering and screaming)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we all take a nervous swig of our fire resistance potions? Like, right now? Like glug, glug, glug!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's to the instance where, right now, there's so much going on that Thordak is having this Superman moment where he closes his eyes and hears all the screams in the city at once. So you don't know if he knows where you are yet, or has seen you, he just knows that something's here. And that's where we're going to pick up next session.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Double-fisting them, gulp gulp!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Smoke 'em if you got 'em! I'm going to vape-- I'm going to vape my fire resistance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm pretty sure you can get that at Critical Vapes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah! You can get that there.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Critical Vapes!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shout out!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Merry deathmas, everyone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Merry deathmas.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What happens to Kash and Zahra?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're currently preventing you guys from having to deal with Thordak and two fire giants and a bunch of elementals.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But how do we know what happens?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't die and you'll find out.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If only.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's just a buddy cop movie.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: We're in a really old Mustang the whole time.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would watch the fuck out of that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I would. Oh my god. That's the best version of Dallas I've ever heard of. Which has an RPG book.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can roleplay Dallas?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah! I'm trying to find a copy of it. But anyway, that's neither here nor there. We'll be here next week for the showdown with Thordak the Cinder King in the center of Emon! You guys, you avoided a lot. You beelined to Thordak.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We were out of time!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We would have gone into this next time. I was preparing for Thordak--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Always rely on tentacles.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If anime has taught you anything--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't tell the internet that.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: If anime has taught us anything--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know! No, I was expecting this Thordak encounter to either happen next week or in the first two weeks of January when we come back from the break, I wasn't sure when. You bypassed a bunch there.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Great way to end the year, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is a good way to end the year!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) Here comes Cinder Claus, here comes Cinder Claus, right down Cinder Claus Lane!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yeah, it's just the two of us and the fire giants!

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: While I sit back and watch her kick some ass!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I thought you were dead, Fred!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You told me they were dead!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We need Brian Blessed now!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need Brian Blessed! We need Brian Blessed for everything!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't disagree with this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He might be down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll see you guys next week for this crazy showdown. Rest well, thank you Loot Crate and Magic Puzzle Quest for being our awesome sponsors for tonight's episode. Thank you all for your patience. Thank you, Will and Mary, for joining us.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: Thanks for having us, you kidding? Thanks for having us back.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Thank you so much!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hopefully you're not dead.

lines.name: WILL
lines.text: It's the only show where you can walk by, "Hey, thanks, hope you're not dead."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we allowed to say, Brian, that they're going to be on Talks Machina?

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: (offscreen) Yeah!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: So we're going to be on Talks Machina on Tuesday. With that Brian Foster man!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you going to be on Talks Machina?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we can't know his secrets just yet!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I've been on a lot of Talks Machina recently, and I could probably use a Tuesday night off.

lines.name: MARY, WILL
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Especially to prepare for this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus I don't want to know any secrets before we go into this fight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd be like: I don't know. That's a great question.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You Don't Know: The Show.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [music]
